DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAllowanceF.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in allowance for credit loss of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

FederalHomeLoanBankStock.label: Federal Home Loan Bank Stock
FederalHomeLoanBankStock.description: Federal Home Loan Bank (FHLB) stock represents an equity interest in a FHLB. It does not have a readily determinable fair value because its ownership is restricted and it lacks a market (liquidity).

SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesInteres.label: Sales-type and Direct Financing Leases, Interest Income
SalesTypeAndDirectFinancingLeasesInteres.description: Amount of interest income from net investment in sales-type and direct financing leases.

VariableLeaseIncome.label: Variable Lease, Income
VariableLeaseIncome.description: Amount of variable lease payments from operating, direct financing, and sales-type leases, excluding amount included in measurement of lease receivable.

AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesFair.label: Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
AccountsPayableAndAccruedLiabilitiesFair.description: Fair value portion of trade and related party payables and accrued expenses.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccumulate.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain (Loss), before Tax
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleAccumulate.description: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain (loss) in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

HeldtomaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityReal.label: Debt Securities, Held-to-maturity, Sold, Realized Gain (Loss), Excluding Other-than-temporary Impairment
HeldtomaturitySecuritiesSoldSecurityReal.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale of investment in debt security measured at amortized cost (held-to-maturity), excluding other-than-temporary impairment (OTTI).

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes, Current
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxesCurre.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes.

AccruedInsuranceCurrent.label: Accrued Insurance, Current
AccruedInsuranceCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccruedLiabilitiesForUnredeeemedGiftCard.label: Gift Card Liability, Current
AccruedLiabilitiesForUnredeeemedGiftCard.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the liability for outstanding gift cards. Retail customers purchase gift cards or gift certificates that can be redeemed at a later date for merchandise or services; those unredeemed represent a liability of the entity because the revenue is being deferred.

AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossO.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Other than Temporary Impairment, Not Credit Loss, Net of Tax, Debt Securities
AccumulatedOtherComprehensiveIncomeLossO.description: Total of accumulated other comprehensive loss related to that portion of other than temporary impairment (OTTI) due to factors other than credit losses on debt securities categorized either as available-for-sale or held-to-maturity that an entity does not intend to sell and which it is not more likely than not that the entity will be required to sell before recovery of the amortized cost basis of the debt security. The amount represented by this item is net of tax, as applicable.

AdditionsToNoncurrentAssets.label: Segment Reporting Information, Expenditures for Additions to Long-Lived Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
AdditionsToNoncurrentAssets.description: Total expenditures for additions to long-lived assets other than financial instruments, long-term customer relationships of a financial institution, mortgage and other servicing rights, deferred policy acquisition costs, and deferred tax assets of the reportable segment; if the amount: (a) is included in the determination of segment assets reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) is otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in the determination of segment assets.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.label: Capital Leases, Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Net
CapitalLeasesBalanceSheetAssetsByMajorCl.description: The total gross amount less the charge for the use of the long-lived depreciable assets subject to a lease meeting the criteria for capitalization.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Net Minimum Payments (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.description: The total contractually required rental payments on capitalized leases net of deductions for: (i) executory costs, including any profit thereon, included in the minimum lease payments and (ii) the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce the net minimum lease payments to present value.

CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.label: Capital Leases, Future Minimum Payments, Net Minimum Payments
CapitalLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsNetMin.description: Amount of minimum lease payments for capital leases net of executory costs, which include amounts paid by the lessee to the lessor for insurance, maintenance and taxes.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Including Disposal Group and Discontinued Operations
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including, but not limited to, disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss
ContractWithCustomerAssetNet.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

DebtInstrumentDecreaseForgiveness.label: Debt Instrument, Decrease, Forgiveness
DebtInstrumentDecreaseForgiveness.description: Decrease for amounts of indebtedness forgiven by the holder of the debt instrument.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentageO.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage of Principal Amount Redeemed
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentageO.description: Percentage of principal amount of debt redeemed.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherLiabilitiesNo.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherLiabilitiesNo.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Net, Current
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Amount, after deferred tax asset, of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable differences, with jurisdictional netting and classified as current.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCap.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Inventory
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpenseCap.description: Amount of deferred tax consequences attributable to taxable temporary differences derived from inventory.

DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.label: Defined Contribution Plan, Employers Matching Contribution, Annual Vesting Percentage
DefinedContributionPlanEmployersMatching.description: Percentage of employer's matching contributions to a defined contribution plan that vests in a given year.

DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.label: Discontinued Operation, Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operation, before Income Tax
DiscontinuedOperationIncomeLossFromDisco.description: Amount before tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

DiscontinuedOperationTaxExpenseBenefitFr.label: Discontinued Operation, Tax (Expense) Benefit from Provision for (Gain) Loss on Disposal
DiscontinuedOperationTaxExpenseBenefitFr.description: Amount of tax (expense) benefit on (gain) loss recognized for the (reversal of write-down) write-down to fair value, less cost to sell, of a discontinued operation.

DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.label: Disposal Group, Deferred Gain on Disposal
DisposalGroupDeferredGainOnDisposal.description: "The excess amount received or due over net assets in a transaction accounted for as a divestiture where a subsidiary, business or operating assets are ""sold"" by the entity to a newly formed, thinly capitalized, highly leveraged buyer. This gain is not yet recognized and is disclosed on the balance sheet as an offset against the carrying amount of the securities received."

DividendsPayableAmountPerShare.label: Dividends Payable, Amount Per Share
DividendsPayableAmountPerShare.description: The per share amount of a dividend declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

DividendsPayableCurrent.label: Dividends Payable, Current
DividendsPayableCurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of dividends declared but unpaid on equity securities issued by the entity and outstanding. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Change in Deferred Tax Assets Valuation Allowance, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationChan.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to changes in the valuation allowance for deferred tax assets.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Disposition of Business, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDisp.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to disposition of a business not qualifying as a discontinued operation.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepa.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Repatriation of Foreign Earnings, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationRepa.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the repatriation of foreign earnings.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax on Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Percentage of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNonc.label: Employee-related Liabilities
EmployeeRelatedLiabilitiesCurrentAndNonc.description: Total of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable for obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

FinancingReceivable.label: Financing Receivable (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FinancingReceivable.description: The amount of the recorded investment in a contractual right to receive money on demand or on fixed or determinable dates that is recognized as an asset in the creditor's statement of financial position. Examples include, but are not limited to, accounts receivable (with terms exceeding one year), notes receivable and receivables relating to lessor's rights to payments from leases other than operating leases that have been recorded as assets.

FixturesAndEquipmentGross.label: Fixtures and Equipment, Gross
FixturesAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of fixtures and equipment. Includes, but is not limited to, machinery, equipment, and engines.

ForeignEarningsRepatriated.label: Foreign Earnings Repatriated
ForeignEarningsRepatriated.description: Amount of foreign earnings repatriated from subsidiaries outside the country of domicile.

GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Business
GainLossOnSaleOfBusiness.description: Amount of gain (loss) from sale and disposal of integrated set of activities and assets capable of being conducted and managed for purpose of providing return in form of dividend, lower cost, or other economic benefit to investor, owner, member and participant.

GoodwillTranslationAdjustments.label: Goodwill, Translation Adjustments (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
GoodwillTranslationAdjustments.description: Amount of increase (decrease) from foreign currency translation adjustments of an asset representing future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperations.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the parent.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Net of Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsAttrib.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to the noncontrolling interest.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerBas.description: The amount of net income (loss) from continuing operations per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromContinuingOperationsPerDil.description: The amount of net income (loss) derived from continuing operations during the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Including Portion Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Amount after tax of income (loss) from a discontinued operation including the portion attributable to the noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, the income (loss) from operations during the phase-out period, gain (loss) on disposal, gain (loss) for reversal of write-down (write-down) to fair value, less cost to sell, and adjustments to a prior period gain (loss) on disposal.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Basic Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per basic share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.label: Income (Loss) from Discontinued Operations and Disposal of Discontinued Operations, Net of Tax, Per Diluted Share
IncomeLossFromDiscontinuedOperationsNetO.description: Per diluted share amount, after tax, of income (loss) from the day-to-day business activities of the discontinued operation and gain (loss) from the disposal of the discontinued operation.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Other Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndOtherReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; includes accounts receivable and other types of receivables.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accrued Taxes Payable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccruedTaxesPayable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of all taxes owed but not paid, including income, property and other taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations.label: Increase (Decrease) in Obligation, Pension Benefits
IncreaseDecreaseInPensionPlanObligations.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in obligation for pension benefits. Includes, but is not limited to, defined benefit or defined contribution plans. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

IncreaseDecreaseInRetailRelatedInventori.label: Increase (Decrease) in Retail Related Inventories
IncreaseDecreaseInRetailRelatedInventori.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the book value of merchandise inventory held by a retailer, wholesaler, or distributor for future sale; includes packaging and other supplies used to store, transport, or present merchandise inventory.

InterestCostsCapitalized.label: Interest Costs Capitalized
InterestCostsCapitalized.description: Amount of interest capitalized during the period.

InterestExpenseLesseeAssetsUnderCapitalL.label: Interest Expense, Lessee, Assets under Capital Lease
InterestExpenseLesseeAssetsUnderCapitalL.description: The amount, during the lease term, of each minimum [capital] lease payment allocated to interest expense so as to produce a constant periodic rate of interest on the remaining balance of the capital lease obligation.

InterestRateDerivativesAtFairValueNet.label: Interest Rate Derivatives, at Fair Value, Net
InterestRateDerivativesAtFairValueNet.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of interest rate derivative assets, net of interest rate derivative liabilities, which includes all such derivative instruments in hedging and nonhedging relationships that are recognized on the balance sheet.

LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
LiabilitiesOfDisposalGroupIncludingDisco.description: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

LineOfCredit.label: Long-term Line of Credit
LineOfCredit.description: The carrying value as of the balance sheet date of the current and noncurrent portions of long-term obligations drawn from a line of credit, which is a bank's commitment to make loans up to a specific amount. Examples of items that might be included in the application of this element may consist of letters of credit, standby letters of credit, and revolving credit arrangements, under which borrowings can be made up to a maximum amount as of any point in time conditional on satisfaction of specified terms before, as of and after the date of drawdowns on the line. Includes short-term obligations that would normally be classified as current liabilities but for which (a) postbalance sheet date issuance of a long term obligation to refinance the short term obligation on a long term basis, or (b) the enterprise has entered into a financing agreement that clearly permits the enterprise to refinance the short-term obligation on a long term basis and the following conditions are met (1) the agreement does not expire within 1 year and is not cancelable by the lender except for violation of an objectively determinable provision, (2) no violation exists at the BS date, and (3) the lender has entered into the financing agreement is expected to be financially capable of honoring the agreement.

LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.label: Line of Credit Facility, Amount Outstanding (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LineOfCreditFacilityAmountOutstanding.description: Amount borrowed under the credit facility as of the balance sheet date.

LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.label: Loss Contingency, Estimate of Possible Loss
LossContingencyEstimateOfPossibleLoss.description: Reflects the estimated amount of loss from the specified contingency as of the balance sheet date.

MachineryAndEquipmentGross.label: Machinery and Equipment, Gross
MachineryAndEquipmentGross.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation of tangible personal property used to produce goods and services, including, but is not limited to, tools, dies and molds, computer and office equipment.

MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Change in Redemption Value
MinorityInterestChangeInRedemptionValue.description: Change in noncontrolling interest during the period as a result of a change in the redemption value of redeemable noncontrolling interest.

MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Decrease from Redemptions or Purchase of Interests
MinorityInterestDecreaseFromRedemptions.description: Decrease in noncontrolling interest (for example, but not limited to, redeeming or purchasing the interests of noncontrolling shareholders, issuance of shares (interests) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to the parent entity for other than cash, and a buyback of shares (interest) by the non-wholly owned subsidiary from the noncontrolling interests).

NetIncomeLossAttributableToNonredeemable.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToNonredeemable.description: Portion of net income (loss) attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest.

NetIncomeLossAttributableToRedeemableNon.label: Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossAttributableToRedeemableNon.description: Amount of Net Income (Loss) attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Effect of Change on Operating Results (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Amount of the effect of a change in accounting principle on operating profit or loss.

NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.label: Noncontrolling Interest, Increase from Subsidiary Equity Issuance
NoncontrollingInterestIncreaseFromSubsid.description: Amount of increase in noncontrolling interest from subsidiary issuance of equity interests to noncontrolling interest holders.

NumberOfCountriesInWhichEntityOperates.label: Number of Countries in which Entity Operates
NumberOfCountriesInWhichEntityOperates.description: The number of countries in which the entity operates as of balance sheet date.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseContingentRent.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Contingent Rentals
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseContingentRent.description: The increases or decreases in lease payments that result from changes occurring after the inception of the lease in the factors (other than the passage of time) on which lease payments are based, except that any escalation of minimum lease payments relating to increases in construction or acquisition cost of the leased property or for increases in some measure of cost or value during the construction or preconstruction period, are excluded from contingent rentals. Contingent rentals also may include amounts for which the triggering events have not yet occurred or the specified targets for which have not yet been achieved (such as sales based percentage rent), but which events are considered probable of occurring or which specified targets are considered probable of being achieved.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeEx.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments, Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeEx.description: Amount, after adjustments, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetInvestmen.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net Investment Hedge, Gain (Loss), before Reclassification and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossNetInvestmen.description: Amount, before tax and reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative designated and qualifying as net investment hedge.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLi.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Minimum Pension Liability Net Adjustment, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLi.description: The after-tax amount of the change in the additional pension liability not yet recognized pursuant to FAS 87 par 37 and 38 as a net periodic pension cost. If the additional pension liability required to be recognized exceeds the unrecognized prior service costs, then the excess (which is the net loss not yet recognized as net periodic pension cost) is to be recorded as a reduction of other comprehensive income, before adjusting for tax effects. If in a subsequent measurement, the amount of minimum liability is eliminated or adjusted, this adjustment is offset against other comprehensive income in Accumulated Comprehensive Income. This line also includes changes in an entity's share of an equity investee's Increase or Decrease in additional pension liability not yet recognized as a net periodic pension cost. Eliminated upon adoption of FAS 158.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLi.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Minimum Pension Liability Net Adjustment, Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeMinimumPensionLi.description: The tax effect of the amount of the change in the additional minimum pension liability not yet recognized pursuant to FAS 87 as a net periodic pension cost. If the additional pension liability required to be recognized exceeds the unrecognized prior service costs, then the excess (which is the net loss not yet recognized as net periodic pension cost) is to be recorded as a separate component in other comprehensive income, before adjusting for tax effects. In a subsequent measurement, the elimination or adjustment to the amount of the minimum pension liability recorded in accumulated other comprehensive income is included in this line. Eliminated upon adoption of FAS 158.

OtherIncome.label: Other Income
OtherIncome.description: Amount of revenue and income classified as other.

OtherLongTermDebt.label: Other Long-term Debt
OtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of long-term debt classified as other.

OtherMinorityInterests.label: Other Noncontrolling Interests
OtherMinorityInterests.description: Carrying amount of equity interests owned by noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities consolidated into the reporting entity's financial statements other than joint ventures, limited partnerships, operating partnerships or interests held by preferred unit holders.

PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.label: Payments for Capital Improvements
PaymentsForCapitalImprovements.description: The cash outflow for acquisition of or capital improvements to properties held for investment (operating, managed, leased) or for use.

PaymentsForRent.label: Payments for Rent
PaymentsForRent.description: Cash payments to lessor's for use of assets under operating leases.

PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.label: Payments of Ordinary Dividends, Noncontrolling Interest
PaymentsOfDividendsMinorityInterest.description: Amount of cash outflow in the form of ordinary dividends provided by the non-wholly owned subsidiary to noncontrolling interests.

PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.label: Payments to Acquire Interest in Joint Venture
PaymentsToAcquireInterestInJointVenture.description: The cash outflow associated with the investment in or advances to an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group.

PreOpeningCosts.label: Pre-Opening Costs
PreOpeningCosts.description: Expenditures associated with opening new locations which are noncapital in nature and expensed as incurred.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term debt that is not secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt unsecured debt.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.label: Proceeds from Issuance or Sale of Equity
ProceedsFromIssuanceOrSaleOfEquity.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of common stock, preferred stock, treasury stock, stock options, and other types of equity.

ReceivablesNetCurrent.label: Receivables, Net, Current
ReceivablesNetCurrent.description: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.label: Redeemable Noncontrolling Interest, Equity, Carrying Amount
RedeemableNoncontrollingInterestEquityCa.description: As of the reporting date, the aggregate carrying amount of all noncontrolling interests which are redeemable by the (parent) entity (1) at a fixed or determinable price on a fixed or determinable date, (2) at the option of the holder of the noncontrolling interest, or (3) upon occurrence of an event that is not solely within the control of the (parent) entity. This item includes noncontrolling interest holder's ownership (or holders' ownership) regardless of the type of equity interest (common, preferred, other) including all potential organizational (legal) forms of the investee entity.

SecuredLongTermDebt.label: Secured Long-term Debt, Noncurrent
SecuredLongTermDebt.description: Carrying amount of collateralized debt obligations with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer, excluding the current portion. Obligations include, but not limited to, mortgage loans, chattel loans, and other borrowings secured by assets.

SelfInsuranceReserve.label: Self Insurance Reserve
SelfInsuranceReserve.description: Carrying amount (including both current and noncurrent portions) of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

SelfInsuranceReserveCurrent.label: Self Insurance Reserve, Current
SelfInsuranceReserveCurrent.description: Carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred as of the balance sheet date for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property that are expected to be paid within one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer).

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Compensation Cost (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: Equity-based compensation cost during the period with respect to the award, which will be recognized in income (as well as the total recognized tax benefit) or capitalized as part of the cost of an asset.

ShorttermDebtMaximumMonthendOutstandingA.label: Short-term Debt, Maximum Month-end Outstanding Amount
ShorttermDebtMaximumMonthendOutstandingA.description: For the form of debt having an initial term of less than one year or less than the normal operating cycle, if longer, maximum month-end borrowings during the period.

TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Amount
TaxCreditCarryforwardAmount.description: The amount of the tax credit carryforward, before tax effects, available to reduce future taxable income under enacted tax laws.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDe.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Liability, Income Tax Benefit
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017ChangeInTaxRateDe.description: Amount of income tax benefit for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Change in Tax Rate, Deferred Tax Liability, Provisional Income Tax Benefit (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of reasonable estimate for income tax benefit for which accounting for tax effect for remeasurement of deferred tax liability from change in tax rate is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax for Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Income Tax Expense
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017TransitionTaxForA.description: Amount of income tax expense from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

TerminationLoans.label: Termination Loans
TerminationLoans.description: Definite liabilities to third parties under a termination loan agreement, whether or not guaranteed in whole or in part by the government.

TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHed.label: Derivatives used in Net Investment Hedge, Loss (Gain), Reclassified to Earnings, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2016-01-31)
TranslationAdjustmentForNetInvestmentHed.description: Amounts reclassified from other comprehensive income to earnings during the period as a result of the sale or complete or substantially complete liquidation of an investment in a foreign entity. Net of tax effect.

UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Investments
UnrealizedGainLossOnInvestments.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of statutory penalties accrued for a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed by the entity, in its tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Income Tax Penalties Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncomeTaxPenaltie.description: Amount of expense for penalties related to a tax position claimed or expected to be claimed in the tax return.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Accrued
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense accrued for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Interest on Income Taxes Expense
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsInterestOnIncomeT.description: Amount of interest expense for an underpayment of income taxes.

UnsecuredDebt.label: Unsecured Debt
UnsecuredDebt.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of uncollateralized debt obligations (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

ValuationAllowanceAmount.label: Valuation Allowance, Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
ValuationAllowanceAmount.description: The amount of the valuation allowance recorded as of the balance sheet date pertaining to the specified deferred tax asset for which an assessment was made that it is more likely than not that all or a portion of such deferred tax asset will not be realized through related deductions on future tax returns.

WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.label: Workers' Compensation Liability
WorkersCompensationLiabilityCurrentAndNo.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations and payables pertaining to claims incurred of a workers compensation nature.

NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.label: Net Income (Loss), Including Portion Attributable to Nonredeemable Noncontrolling Interest
NetIncomeLossIncludingPortionAttributabl.description: Amount after income tax of income (loss) including the portion attributable to nonredeemable noncontrolling interest. Excludes the portion attributable to redeemable noncontrolling interest recognized as temporary equity.

InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet.label: Interest Income (Expense), Nonoperating, Net
InterestIncomeExpenseNonoperatingNet.description: The net amount of nonoperating interest income (expense).

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Writeoff
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableWr.description: Amount of direct write-downs of accounts receivable charged against the allowance.

AmortizationOfLeasedAsset.label: Amortization of Leased Asset
AmortizationOfLeasedAsset.description: The expense charged against earnings for the periodic recognition of capitalized leases. This element may apply to energy companies that lease mineral producing properties and to other enterprises that capitalize property, plant, or equipment obtained through capital leases.

BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityO.label: Business Acquisition, Cost of Acquired Entity, Other Noncash Consideration (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionCostOfAcquiredEntityO.description: Fair value of noncash consideration given by the acquirer to acquire the entity. Does not include cash paid, the fair value of debt and securities issued and liabilities incurred to acquire the entity.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Noncurrent Liabilities, Long-term Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to the noncurrent portion of the long-term debt assumed from the acquired entity.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Other Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: Amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to other noncurrent liabilities not separately disclosed.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Liabilities Incurred
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of liabilities incurred by the acquirer as part of consideration transferred in a business combination.

BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.label: Business Combination, Consideration Transferred, Other
BusinessCombinationConsiderationTransfer.description: Amount of tangible or intangible assets, including a business or subsidiary of the acquirer transferred by the entity to the former owners of the acquiree. Excludes cash.

BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationEa.label: Business Combination, Pro Forma Information, Earnings or Loss of Acquiree since Acquisition Date, Actual
BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationEa.description: This element represents the amount of earnings or loss of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated income statement for the reporting period.

BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationRe.label: Business Combination, Pro Forma Information, Revenue of Acquiree since Acquisition Date, Actual
BusinessCombinationProFormaInformationRe.description: This element represents the amount of revenue of the acquiree since the acquisition date included in the consolidated income statement for the reporting period.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Assets Noncurrent
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowance, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards acquired at the acquisition date, classified as noncurrent.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Deferred Tax Liabilities Noncurrent
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary difference assumed at the acquisition date that are classified as noncurrent.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Net
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount recognized as of the acquisition date for the identifiable assets acquired in excess of (less than) the aggregate liabilities assumed.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Noncurrent Liabilities, Other
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other liabilities due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, assumed at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Other Noncurrent Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of other assets expected to be realized or consumed after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Property, Plant, and Equipment
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: The amount of property, plant, and equipment recognized as of the acquisition date.

CapitalizedComputerSoftwarePeriodIncreas.label: Capitalized Computer Software, Period Increase (Decrease)
CapitalizedComputerSoftwarePeriodIncreas.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized computer software costs.

CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.label: Capital Leases, Income Statement, Amortization Expense
CapitalLeasesIncomeStatementAmortization.description: The charge for the use of long-lived depreciable capital leased assets for the period.

CommitmentsFairValueDisclosure.label: Commitments, Fair Value Disclosure
CommitmentsFairValueDisclosure.description: Fair value portion of arrangements with third parties, including, but not limited to, operating lease arrangement and arrangement in which the entity has agreed to expend funds to procure goods or services, or has agreed to commit resources to supply goods or services.

ConstructionLoanNoncurrent.label: Long-term Construction Loan, Noncurrent
ConstructionLoanNoncurrent.description: This element represents the noncurrent portion of a long-term real estate loan to finance building costs. The funds are disbursed as needed or in accordance with a prearranged plan; generally, a portion of the funds is disbursed at inception and the remainder as construction progresses. The money is repaid on completion of the project (generally one to seven years), usually from the proceeds of a mortgage loan. The rate is normally higher than the prime rate, and there is usually an origination fee. The effective yield on these loans tends to be high, and the lender has a security interest in the real property.

ContractualObligation.label: Contractual Obligation
ContractualObligation.description: Amount of contractual obligation, including but not limited to, long-term debt, capital lease obligations, operating lease obligations, purchase obligations, and other commitments.

ContractualObligationDueAfterFifthYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
ContractualObligationDueAfterFifthYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInFifthYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
ContractualObligationDueInFifthYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInFourthYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
ContractualObligationDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInNextTwelveMont.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
ContractualObligationDueInNextTwelveMont.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInSecondYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
ContractualObligationDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationDueInThirdYear.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
ContractualObligationDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

ContractualObligationFutureMinimumPaymen.label: Contractual Obligation, to be Paid, Remainder of Fiscal Year
ContractualObligationFutureMinimumPaymen.description: Amount of contractual obligation to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

ContractWithCustomerRefundLiability.label: Contract with Customer, Refund Liability
ContractWithCustomerRefundLiability.description: Amount of liability for consideration received or receivable from customer which is not included in transaction price, when consideration is expected to be refunded to customer.

ContractWithCustomerRightToRecoverProduc.label: Contract with Customer, Right to Recover Product
ContractWithCustomerRightToRecoverProduc.description: Amount of right to recover product from customer on settling refund liability.

DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.label: Debt Instrument, Basis Spread on Variable Rate
DebtInstrumentBasisSpreadOnVariableRate1.description: Percentage points added to the reference rate to compute the variable rate on the debt instrument.

DeferredTaxAssetsGrossCurrent.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Gross, Current
DeferredTaxAssetsGrossCurrent.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and carryforwards classified as current.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpense.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpense.description: Amount, before allocation of valuation allowances, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences from reserves and accruals, compensation and benefit costs, and other provisions, reserves, and allowances.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Deferred Expense
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDeferredExpense.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from capitalized costs.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Transition Tax on Accumulated Foreign Earnings, Amount
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxC.description: Amount of reported income tax expense (benefit) in excess of (less than) expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying domestic federal statutory income tax rate to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations, attributable to increase (decrease) from transition tax on accumulated earnings of controlled foreign corporation deemed repatriated pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act.

EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.label: Equity Method Investment, Realized Gain (Loss) on Disposal
EquityMethodInvestmentRealizedGainLossOn.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of an equity method investment.

EquityMethodInvestmentSoldCarryingAmount.label: Equity Method Investment, Amount Sold
EquityMethodInvestmentSoldCarryingAmount.description: Amount of the entity's equity method investment which has been sold.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Current Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of current liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Gross Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of gross profit (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations reported by an equity method investee.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Net Income (Loss) (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of net income (loss) reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent assets reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of noncurrent liabilities reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Redeemable Preferred Stock (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of redeemable preferred stock reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Revenue (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: Amount of revenue from sale of product and rendering of service reported by equity method investee.

FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.label: Finance Lease, Right-of-Use Asset, before Accumulated Amortization
FinanceLeaseRightOfUseAssetBeforeAccumul.description: Amount, before accumulated amortization, of right-of-use asset from finance lease.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFutureAmortiz.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Future Amortization Expense (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsFutureAmortiz.description: The aggregate estimated amortization expense for succeeding fiscal years for intangible assets subject to amortization.

FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWeightedAvera.label: Finite-Lived Intangible Assets, Weighted-Average Useful Life (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
FiniteLivedIntangibleAssetsWeightedAvera.description: The calculated weighted-average useful life of all finite-lived intangible assets.

GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.label: Goodwill and Intangible Asset Impairment
GoodwillAndIntangibleAssetImpairment.description: Total loss recognized during the period from the impairment of goodwill plus the loss recognized in the period resulting from the impairment of the carrying amount of intangible assets, other than goodwill.

IncomeTaxExaminationEstimateOfPossibleLo.label: Income Tax Examination, Estimate of Possible Loss
IncomeTaxExaminationEstimateOfPossibleLo.description: Estimated amount of loss resulting from an adverse tax position.

IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRecorded.label: Income Tax Examination, Liability Recorded (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeTaxExaminationLiabilityRecorded.description: The estimated loss resulting from the income tax examination that has been accrued as of the balance sheet date, including interest and penalties.

IncomeTaxExaminationRangeOfPossibleLosse.label: Income Tax Examination, Range of Possible Losses (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncomeTaxExaminationRangeOfPossibleLosse.description: The estimated range of reasonably possible losses resulting from an adverse position taken by a taxing authority.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableAndO.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable and Other Operating Assets
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableAndO.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in receivables, and operating assets classified as other.

InventoryValuationReserves.label: Inventory Valuation Reserves
InventoryValuationReserves.description: Amount of valuation reserve for inventory.

LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.label: Line of Credit Facility, Fair Value of Amount Outstanding
LineOfCreditFacilityFairValueOfAmountOut.description: Fair value of the amount outstanding under the credit facility.

LongtermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.label: Long-term Debt, Weighted Average Interest Rate, at Point in Time
LongtermDebtWeightedAverageInterestRate.description: Weighted average interest rate of long-term debt outstanding calculated at point in time.

LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Sought, Value
LossContingencyDamagesSoughtValue.description: The value (monetary amount) of the award the plaintiff seeks in the legal matter.

LossContingencyPatentsAllegedlyInfringed.label: Loss Contingency, Patents Allegedly Infringed, Number
LossContingencyPatentsAllegedlyInfringed.description: Number of another entity's patents that the entity has allegedly infringed.

OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItemsIncludedI.label: Other Adjustments for Noncash Items Included in Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
OtherAdjustmentsForNoncashItemsIncludedI.description: Transactions that result in no cash inflows or outflows in the period in which they occur, but affect net income and thus are removed when calculating net cash flow from operating activities using the indirect method. This element is used when there is not a more specific and appropriate element.

OtherCommitmentDueAfterFifthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, after Year Five
OtherCommitmentDueAfterFifthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInFifthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Five
OtherCommitmentDueInFifthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInFourthYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Four
OtherCommitmentDueInFourthYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInSecondYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Two
OtherCommitmentDueInSecondYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherCommitmentDueInThirdYear.label: Other Commitment, to be Paid, Year Three
OtherCommitmentDueInThirdYear.description: Amount of commitment classified as other to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.label: Other Comprehensive Income, Other, Net of Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeOtherNetOfTax.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in other comprehensive income, after tax, from changes classified as other.

OtherLiabilitiesAndDeferredRevenueNoncur.label: Other Liabilities and Deferred Revenue, Noncurrent
OtherLiabilitiesAndDeferredRevenueNoncur.description: Aggregate carrying amount, as of the balance sheet date, of noncurrent obligations and noncurrent portion of deferred revenue not separately disclosed in the balance sheet. Noncurrent liabilities are expected to be paid after one year (or the normal operating cycle, if longer). Deferred revenue is a liability related to a revenue producing activity for which revenue has not yet been recognized, and is not expected to be recognized in the next twelve months.

OtherOperatingIncome.label: Other Operating Income
OtherOperatingIncome.description: The total amount of other operating income, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operation.

OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.label: Other Operating Income (Expense), Net
OtherOperatingIncomeExpenseNet.description: The net amount of other operating income and expenses, the components of which are not separately disclosed on the income statement, from items that are associated with the entity's normal revenue producing operations.

OtherRestrictedAssetsCurrent.label: Other Restricted Assets, Current
OtherRestrictedAssetsCurrent.description: Amount of current assets that are pledged or subject to withdrawal restrictions, classified as other.

OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.label: Other Tax Expense (Benefit)
OtherTaxExpenseBenefit.description: Amount of other income tax expense (benefit).

PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.label: Payments to Acquire Businesses and Interest in Affiliates
PaymentsToAcquireBusinessesAndInterestIn.description: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of a controlling interest in another entity or an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled (for example, an unconsolidated subsidiary, affiliate, joint venture or equity method investment).

ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.label: Proceeds from Sale, Maturity and Collection of Investments
ProceedsFromSaleMaturityAndCollectionsOf.description: The cash inflow associated with the sale, maturity and collection of all investments such as debt, security and so forth during the period.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Additions
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentAdditions.description: Amount of acquisition of long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment.

ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.label: Accounts Receivable, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ProvisionForDoubtfulAccounts.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on accounts receivable.

RevenueRecognitionSalesReturnsReserveFor.label: Revenue Recognition, Sales Returns, Reserve for Sales Returns

SalesReturnsAndAllowancesGoods.label: Sales Returns and Allowances, Goods (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesReturnsAndAllowancesGoods.description: Total deduction from sales during the period arising from goods returned by customers (other than under warranty provisions) and price reductions (allowance, price protection agreements) given by the entity. Returns and allowances are a deduction from gross revenue in arriving at net revenue.

SalesRevenueServicesNet.label: Sales Revenue, Services, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
SalesRevenueServicesNet.description: Aggregate revenue during the period from services rendered in the normal course of business, after deducting allowances and discounts.

SegmentReportingSegmentOperatingProfitLo.label: Segment Reporting, Segment Operating Profit (Loss) (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingSegmentOperatingProfitLo.description: The total amount of profit or loss for reportable segments.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeBen.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Employee Benefit Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesEmployeeBen.description: Number of shares issued during the period to an employee benefit plan, such as a defined contribution or defined benefit plan.

StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.label: Stock Repurchase Program, Number of Shares Authorized to be Repurchased
StockRepurchaseProgramNumberOfSharesAuth.description: The number of shares authorized to be repurchased by an entity's Board of Directors under a stock repurchase plan.

TaxCreditCarryforwardDeferredTaxAsset.label: Tax Credit Carryforward, Deferred Tax Asset (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
TaxCreditCarryforwardDeferredTaxAsset.description: Amount of deferred tax asset, before valuation allowance, attributable to deductible other tax carryforwards.

TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.label: Translation Adjustment Functional to Reporting Currency, Increase (Decrease), Gross of Tax
TranslationAdjustmentFunctionalToReporti.description: Amount of cumulative translation gain (loss), before tax, from translating foreign currency financial statements into the reporting currency.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits Resulting in Net Operating Loss Carryforward (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsResultingInNetOpe.description: Amount of an unrecognized tax benefit that is directly related to a position taken in a tax year that results in a net operating loss carryforward. This amount is presented as a reduction of the related deferred tax asset in the balance sheet if that deferred tax asset is not used. This amount is presented separately from the deferred tax asset for a net operating loss carryforward if this unrelated tax benefit is associated with a different tax position.

GainLossOnContractTermination.label: Gain (Loss) on Contract Termination
GainLossOnContractTermination.description: Gain (loss) related to the termination of a contract between the parties. The termination may be due to many causes including early termination of a lease by a lessee, a breach of contract by one party, or a failure to perform.

IncreaseDecreaseInSelfInsuranceReserve.label: Increase (Decrease) in Self Insurance Reserve
IncreaseDecreaseInSelfInsuranceReserve.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the carrying amount of accrued known and estimated losses incurred for which no insurance coverage exists, and for which a claim has been made or is probable of being asserted, typically arising from workmen's' compensation-type of incidents and personal injury to nonemployees from accidents on the entity's property.

LossOnContractTermination.label: Loss on Contract Termination
LossOnContractTermination.description: The loss recognized on termination of a contract.

DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-sale, Unrealized Gain (Loss)
DebtSecuritiesAvailableForSaleUnrealized.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

AccruedInsuranceCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Accrued Insurance
AccruedInsuranceCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred through that date and payable to insurance entities to mitigate potential loss from various risks or to satisfy a promise to provide certain coverage's to employees.

AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.label: Share-based Payment Arrangement, Expense, after Tax
AllocatedShareBasedCompensationExpenseNe.description: Amount, after tax, of expense for award under share-based payment arrangement.

BankOverdrafts.label: Bank Overdrafts
BankOverdrafts.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of payments made in excess of existing cash balances, which will be honored by the bank but reflected as a loan to the entity. Overdrafts generally have a very short time frame for correction or repayment and are therefore more similar to short-term bank financing than trade financing.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Goodwill, Expected Tax Deductible Amount
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of goodwill arising from a business combination that is expected to be deductible for tax purposes.

BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.label: Business Combination, Recognized Identifiable Assets Acquired and Liabilities Assumed, Assets
BusinessCombinationRecognizedIdentifiabl.description: Amount of assets acquired at the acquisition date.

BusinessExitCosts.label: Business Exit Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessExitCosts.description: The charge against earnings in the period, comprised of costs incurred associated with an exit or disposal activity other than for a discontinued operations as defined under generally accepted accounting principles. Costs of such activities include those for one-time termination benefits, termination of an operating lease or other contract, consolidating or closing facilities, and relocating employees, and costs associated with an ongoing benefit arrangement, but excludes costs associated with the retirement of a long-lived asset.

CapitalLeasedAssetsNumberOfUnits.label: Capital Leased Assets, Number of Units
CapitalLeasedAssetsNumberOfUnits.description: The number of units (items of property) under capital lease arrangements.

CashPaidForCapitalizedInterest.label: Cash Paid for Capitalized Interest (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
CashPaidForCapitalizedInterest.description: The amount of cash paid during the current period for interest owed on money borrowed that is not charged as an expense but rather is capitalized based on the long term nature of the use of the borrowed funds.

CashSurrenderValueOfLifeInsurance.label: Cash Surrender Value of Life Insurance
CashSurrenderValueOfLifeInsurance.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of amounts which could be received based on the terms of the insurance contract upon surrendering life policies owned by the entity.

CreditAndDebitCardReceivablesAtCarryingV.label: Credit and Debit Card Receivables, at Carrying Value
CreditAndDebitCardReceivablesAtCarryingV.description: Amount due the Entity as a result of customers utilizing point of sale debit or credit cards in exchange transactions with the entity which are short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Generally, only investments with original maturities of three months or less qualify under that definition.

CustomerRefundLiabilityCurrent.label: Customer Refund Liability, Current
CustomerRefundLiabilityCurrent.description: Current regulatory liabilities generally represent obligations to make refunds to customers for various reasons including overpayment.

DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
DebtInstrumentRedemptionPricePercentage.description: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

DeferredFinanceCostsNet.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
DeferredFinanceCostsNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsCurrent.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Assets, Current
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherAssetsCurrent.description: Amount after allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences and other assets expected to be realized or consumed within one year or normal operating cycle, if longer.

DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherTaxLiabilitie.label: Deferred Income Taxes and Other Tax Liabilities, Noncurrent
DeferredIncomeTaxesAndOtherTaxLiabilitie.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences, after deferred tax asset, and other tax liabilities expected to be paid after one year or operating cycle, if longer.

DividendsPayableAmount.label: Dividends Payable, Amount (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DividendsPayableAmount.description: The aggregate amount of dividends declared, but not paid, as of the financial reporting date.

EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt.label: Early Repayment of Senior Debt
EarlyRepaymentOfSeniorDebt.description: The cash outflow for the extinguishment of long-term borrowing, with the highest claim on the assets of the entity in case of bankruptcy or liquidation, before its maturity.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

GainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstr.label: Gain (Loss) on Foreign Currency Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments
GainLossOnForeignCurrencyDerivativeInstr.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of foreign currency derivatives not designated as hedging instruments.

GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Oil and Gas and Timber Property
GainLossOnSaleOfProperty.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of oil and gas property or timber property.

IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.label: Income (Loss) from Equity Method Investments, Net of Dividends or Distributions
IncomeLossFromEquityMethodInvestmentsNet.description: This element represents the undistributed income (or loss) of equity method investments, net of dividends or other distributions received from unconsolidated subsidiaries, certain corporate joint ventures, and certain noncontrolled corporations; such investments are accounted for under the equity method of accounting. This element excludes distributions that constitute a return of investment, which are classified as investing activities.

IncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmp.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Employee Stock Ownership Plan Dividend, Amount
IncomeTaxRateReconciliationDeductionsEmp.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for dividend paid to employee stock ownership plan.

IncreaseDecreaseInOutstandingChecksFinan.label: Increase (Decrease) in Outstanding Checks, Financing Activities
IncreaseDecreaseInOutstandingChecksFinan.description: The change in cash during the period due to the net increase or decrease in outstanding checks, the liability that represents checks that have been issued but that have not cleared. The entity may classify these cash flows as financing or operating activities.

InterestAndOtherIncome.label: Interest and Other Income
InterestAndOtherIncome.description: The amount of interest income and other income recognized during the period. Included in this element is interest derived from investments in debt securities, cash and cash equivalents, and other investments which reflect the time value of money or transactions in which the payments are for the use or forbearance of money and other income from ancillary business-related activities (that is, excluding major activities considered part of the normal operations of the business).

InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.label: Interest on Convertible Debt, Net of Tax
InterestOnConvertibleDebtNetOfTax.description: The after-tax amount of interest recognized in the period associated with any convertible debt.

InterestPaidCapitalized.label: Interest Paid, Capitalized, Investing Activities
InterestPaidCapitalized.description: Amount of cash paid for interest capitalized, classified as investing activity.

InventoryLIFOReserve.label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve
InventoryLIFOReserve.description: Amount by which inventory stated at last-in first-out (LIFO) is less than (in excess of) inventory stated at other inventory cost methods.

InventoryLIFOReserveEffectOnIncomeNet.label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve, Effect on Income, Net
InventoryLIFOReserveEffectOnIncomeNet.description: The difference between the change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods and any LIFO decrement which have been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

InventoryLIFOReservePeriodCharge.label: Inventory, LIFO Reserve, Period Charge
InventoryLIFOReservePeriodCharge.description: The change in the inventory reserve representing the cumulative difference in cost between the first in, first out and the last in, first out inventory valuation methods, which change has been reflected in the statement of income during the period.

InvestmentIncomeNonoperating.label: Investment Income, Nonoperating
InvestmentIncomeNonoperating.description: The aggregate amount of income from investments (for example, dividends) not considered a component of the entity's core operations.

LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.label: Litigation Settlement, Amount Awarded to Other Party
LitigationSettlementAmountAwardedToOther.description: Amount awarded to other party in judgment or settlement of litigation.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePerio.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Period Increase (Decrease)
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValuePerio.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in loss contingency liability.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.label: Loss Contingency Accrual, Carrying Value, Provision (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueProvi.description: The charge against earnings in the period to increase loss contingency liabilities, net of any adjustments to reduce previously estimated charges.

LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.label: Loss Contingency, Damages Awarded, Value
LossContingencyDamagesAwardedValue.description: Amount of damages awarded to the plaintiff in the legal matter.

NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.label: New Accounting Pronouncement or Change in Accounting Principle, Cumulative Effect of Change on Equity or Net Assets (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
NewAccountingPronouncementOrChangeInAcco.description: Amount of cumulative effect of the change in accounting principle or new accounting pronouncement on retained earnings or other components of equity or net assets in the statement of financial position as of the beginning of the earliest period presented.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as noncurrent.
