IncomeTaxReconciliationEquityInEarningsL.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndNotesReceiv.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts and Notes Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsAndNotesReceiv.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the sum of amounts due within one year (or one business cycle) from customers for the credit sale of goods and services; and from note holders for outstanding loans.

IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssetsAndL.label: Increase (Decrease) in Other Current Assets and Liabilities, Net
IncreaseDecreaseInOtherCurrentAssetsAndL.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in current operating assets after deduction of current operating liabilities classified as other.

IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.label: Increase (Decrease) in Restricted Cash
IncreaseDecreaseInRestrictedCash.description: The net cash inflow or outflow for the increase (decrease) associated with funds that are not available for withdrawal or use (such as funds held in escrow) and are associated with underlying transactions that are classified as investing activities.

InventoryCrudeOilProductsAndMerchandise.label: Energy Related Inventory, Crude Oil, Products and Merchandise
InventoryCrudeOilProductsAndMerchandise.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of finished goods inventories for petroleum products, crude oil, petrochemical products, and other oil and gas inventories.

InventoryFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProcess.label: Inventory, Finished Goods and Work in Process, Gross
InventoryFinishedGoodsAndWorkInProcess.description: Amount before valuation reserves of merchandise or goods held by the entity that are readily available for sale and items held by the entity which are partially complete or in the process of being readied for sale.

InventoryPartsAndComponents.label: Inventory, Parts and Components (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
InventoryPartsAndComponents.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date for elements of machinery or equipment held for the purpose of replacing similar parts in the course of repair or maintenance.

InvestmentsAndOtherNoncurrentAssets.label: Investments and Other Noncurrent Assets
InvestmentsAndOtherNoncurrentAssets.description: Amount of investments, and noncurrent assets classified as other.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in and Advance to Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Amount of investment in equity method investee and investment in and advance to affiliate.

InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesBala.label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, Balance, Principal Amount
InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesBala.description: Amount of principal loans outstanding to affiliates for management investment companies.

LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.label: Liabilities of Assets Held-for-sale (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
LiabilitiesOfAssetsHeldForSale.description: Liability (such as a mortgage) related to a disposal group that is held for sale and anticipated to be sold in less than one year. The liability is expected to be discharged as part of the plan of sale for the asset.

LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseForP.label: Line of Credit Facility, Increase (Decrease), Net
LineOfCreditFacilityIncreaseDecreaseForP.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of the credit facility.

LongTermAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableN.label: Accounts and Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
LongTermAccountsNotesAndLoansReceivableN.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of accounts and financing receivables, classified as noncurrent. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligations.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as noncurrent.

LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.label: Long-term Debt and Lease Obligation, Current
LongTermDebtAndCapitalLeaseObligationsCu.description: Amount of long-term debt and lease obligation, classified as current.

NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAsse.label: Noncash or Part Noncash Acquisition, Other Assets Acquired
NoncashOrPartNoncashAcquisitionOtherAsse.description: Amount of assets, classified as other, acquired in a noncash or part noncash acquisition.

NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.label: Financing Receivable, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
NotesAndLoansReceivableNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of financing receivable, classified as current. Includes, but is not limited to, notes and loan receivable.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum rental payments in aggregate as of the balance sheet date under operating leases.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Five Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fifth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Four Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the fourth year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Three Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the third year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, in Two Years
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future rental payments receivable within the second year from the balance sheet date under an operating lease.

OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.label: Operating Leases, Future Minimum Payments Receivable, Thereafter
OperatingLeasesFutureMinimumPaymentsRece.description: Future minimum lease payments receivable under operating leases for periods greater than five years following the balance sheet date.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities, Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount of tax expense (benefit), after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Costs Arising During Period ,Tax (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.description: Tax effect on the cost of benefit improvement resulting from a plan amendment that occurred during the period. The cost has not been recognized in net periodic benefit cost pursuant. A plan amendment includes provisions that grant increased benefits based on service rendered in prior periods.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Gain (Loss) Recognized in Net Periodic Benefit Cost, Tax (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossReclassifica.description: Tax effect of the income statement impact of the reclassification adjustment for actuarial gain (loss) recognized as a component of net periodic benefit cost.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossTaxPortionAt.description: Tax effect of the change in accumulated other comprehensive income, that is, the tax effect on items included in other comprehensive income during the period that is attributable to the parent entity. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a credit balance consistent with its label.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsExp.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Benefits Expense (Reversal of Expense), Noncash
PensionAndOtherPostretirementBenefitsExp.description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for pension and other postretirement benefits.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBene.label: Pension and Other Postretirement Defined Benefit Plans, Noncurrent Liabilities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBene.description: For classified balance sheets this represents the noncurrent liability for underfunded plans recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit pension plans and other postretirement defined benefit plans. For unclassified balance sheets, this represents the entire liability recognized in the balance sheet that is associated with the defined benefit plans.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.label: Proceeds from Collection of Advance to Affiliate
ProceedsFromCollectionOfAdvanceToAffilia.description: The cash inflow from the collection of money previously advanced to an entity that is related to it but not strictly controlled.

ProceedsFromOtherDebt.label: Proceeds from Other Debt
ProceedsFromOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash inflow from debt classified as other.

ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfReceivabl.label: Proceeds from Sale and Collection of Receivables
ProceedsFromSaleAndCollectionOfReceivabl.description: The cash inflow associated with the proceeds from sale and collection of receivables during the period.

ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.label: Proceeds from Sale of Treasury Stock
ProceedsFromSaleOfTreasuryStock.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of an equity stock that has been previously reacquired by the entity.

ProjectsThatHaveExploratoryWellCostsThat.label: Projects that have Exploratory Well Costs that have been Capitalized for Period Greater than One Year, Number of Projects
ProjectsThatHaveExploratoryWellCostsThat.description: The number of projects for which exploratory well costs have been capitalized for a period of greater than one year after the completion of drilling.

ReclassificationToWellFacilitiesAndEquip.label: Reclassification to Well, Facilities, and Equipment Based on Determination of Proved Reserves
ReclassificationToWellFacilitiesAndEquip.description: Previously capitalized costs of the drilling of wells that were reclassified as part of the costs of the enterprise's wells and related equipment and facilities at the time that proved reserves were found.

RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.label: Repayments of Other Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other.

ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.label: Share-based Compensation, Shares Authorized under Stock Option Plans, Exercise Price Range, Exercisable Options, Weighted Average Remaining Contractual Term (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationSharesAuthorizedUn.description: The weighted average remaining life of the outstanding, exercisable stock options as of the balance sheet date for all option plans in the customized range of exercise prices.

ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.label: Short-term Bank Loans and Notes Payable
ShortTermBankLoansAndNotesPayable.description: Amount of borrowings from a bank classified as other, maturing within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.label: Shares Granted, Value, Share-based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
StockGrantedDuringPeriodValueSharebasedC.description: Value, after forfeiture, of shares granted under share-based payment arrangement. Excludes employee stock ownership plan (ESOP).

TaxesOther.label: Taxes, Other
TaxesOther.description: Amount of tax expense classified as other.

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Imputed Interest
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: If disclosed, the amount of imputed interest necessary to reduce an unconditional purchase obligation to present value on an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation.

PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.label: Payment for Contingent Consideration Liability, Financing Activities
PaymentForContingentConsiderationLiabili.description: Amount of cash outflow, not made soon after acquisition date of business combination, to settle contingent consideration liability up to amount recognized at acquisition date, including, but not limited to, measurement period adjustment and less amount paid soon after acquisition date.

AccretionExpense.label: Accretion Expense
AccretionExpense.description: Amount recognized for the passage of time, typically for liabilities, that have been discounted to their net present values. Excludes accretion associated with asset retirement obligations.

AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies.label: Accrual for Environmental Loss Contingencies
AccrualForEnvironmentalLossContingencies.description: Total costs accrued as of the balance sheet date for environmental loss contingencies.

AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxes.label: Accrual for Taxes Other than Income Taxes (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
AccrualForTaxesOtherThanIncomeTaxes.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable for real and property taxes. For classified balance sheets, used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer); for unclassified balance sheets, used to reflect the total liabilities (regardless of due date).

AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization Expense, Property, Plant and Equipment, Current Charge (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
AccumulatedDepreciationDepletionAndAmort.description: The reporting period depreciation, depletion and amortization expense on long-lived, physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Examples include land, buildings, machinery and equipment, and other types of furniture and equipment including, but not limited to, office equipment, furniture and fixtures, and computer equipment and software.

AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.label: Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsReceivableNo.description: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as noncurrent.

AssetRetirementObligationPeriodIncreaseD.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Period Increase (Decrease)
AssetRetirementObligationPeriodIncreaseD.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in asset retirement obligations.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Property (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to land and building to be used in the normal course of business, not including assets that are held-for-sale.

CapitalizedCostsUncompletedWellsEquipmen.label: Capitalized Costs, Uncompleted Wells, Equipment and Facilities
CapitalizedCostsUncompletedWellsEquipmen.description: Capitalized costs of which include those incurred to (1) drill and equip wells that are not yet completed (2) acquire or construct equipment and facilities that are not yet installed.

CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostPeriodIncr.label: Capitalized Exploratory Well Cost, Period Increase (Decrease)
CapitalizedExploratoryWellCostPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in capitalized exploratory well costs.

CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.label: Capital Leases, Lessee Balance Sheet, Assets by Major Class, Other Property, Plant, and Equipment, Gross
CapitalLeasesLesseeBalanceSheetAssetsByM.description: Amount before depreciation of leased long-lived, physical assets used to produce goods and services and not intended for resale meeting the criteria for capitalization, classified as other.

CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Excluding Exchange Rate Effect
CashCashEquivalentsRestrictedCashAndRest.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; excluding effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetCurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as current.

CostMethodInvestmentsAggregateCarryingAm.label: Cost-method Investments, Aggregate Carrying Amount (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
CostMethodInvestmentsAggregateCarryingAm.description: This element represents the aggregate carrying amount of all cost-method investments held by the Company. Generally, such investments do not have readily determinable fair values and are not required to be accounted for by the equity method. The carrying amount of such securities equates to cost, adjusted for other-than-temporary impairment. The cost method and lower-of-cost or market, an adaptation of the cost method, is generally followed for most investments in noncontrolled corporations, in some corporate joint ventures, and to a lesser extent in unconsolidated subsidiaries, particularly foreign.

CostOfPurchasedOilAndGas.label: Cost of Purchased Oil and Gas (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CostOfPurchasedOilAndGas.description: Cost of oil and gas purchased during the reporting period.

DebtInstrumentInterestRateAtPeriodEnd.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate at Period End (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
DebtInstrumentInterestRateAtPeriodEnd.description: The effective interest rate at the end of the reporting period.

DeferredRevenueAndCreditsNoncurrent.label: Deferred Revenue and Credits, Noncurrent
DeferredRevenueAndCreditsNoncurrent.description: Total carrying amount of consideration received or receivable as of the balance sheet date representing potential earnings that were not as yet recognized as revenue or other forms of income in conformity with GAAP, and which are expected to be recognized as such after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DefinedBenefitPlanEstimatedFutureEmploye.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanEstimatedFutureEmploye.description: The employer's best estimate, as soon as it can be reasonably determined, of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position. Estimated contributions may be presented in the aggregate combining (1) contributions required by funding regulations or laws, (2) discretionary contributions, and (3) noncash contributions.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedContributionsI.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Contributions in Current Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedContributionsI.description: Amount of the employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan in the current fiscal period.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payment, Remainder of Fiscal Year
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: Amount of benefit for defined benefit plan expected to be paid in remainder of current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Employer Contributions, Current Fiscal Year
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureEmployer.description: Amount of contributions received and expected to be received by defined benefit plan from employer in current fiscal year.

DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Current Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan in the current remaining fiscal period.

DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.label: Defined Benefit Plans, Estimated Future Employer Contributions in Next Fiscal Year (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlansEstimatedFutureEmploy.description: Amount of employer's best estimate of contributions expected to be paid to the plan during the next fiscal year beginning after the date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Other, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation maximum percentage in other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Other, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation minimum percentage in other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate, Range Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation maximum percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate, Range Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation minimum percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DerivativeAssetFairValueOffsetAgainstCol.label: Derivative Asset, Fair Value, Offset Against Collateral, Net of Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Policy Election
DerivativeAssetFairValueOffsetAgainstCol.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of assets not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against an obligation to return collateral.

DerivativeAssetNotSubjectToMasterNetting.label: Derivative Asset, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
DerivativeAssetNotSubjectToMasterNetting.description: Fair value of financial asset or other contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative assets.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Asset, at Fair Value
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as an asset.

DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.label: Derivative Instruments Not Designated as Hedging Instruments, Liability, at Fair Value
DerivativeInstrumentsNotDesignatedAsHedg.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of derivative instrument not designated as hedging instrument and classified as a liability.

DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOffsetAgains.label: Derivative Liability, Fair Value, Offset Against Collateral, Net of Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement, Policy Election
DerivativeLiabilityFairValueOffsetAgains.description: Fair value, after effects of master netting arrangements, deduction of liabilities not subject to a master netting arrangement and elected not to be offset, of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, offset against the right to receive collateral.

DerivativeLiabilityNotSubjectToMasterNet.label: Derivative Liability, Not Subject to Master Netting Arrangement Deduction
DerivativeLiabilityNotSubjectToMasterNet.description: Fair value of financial liability or contract with one or more underlyings, notional amount or payment provision or both, and the contract can be net settled by means outside the contract or delivery of an asset, not subject to a master netting arrangement, deducted from derivative liabilities.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Long Lived Assets, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2015-01-31)
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as long lived assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Property, Plant and Equipment, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DividendsCommonStockStock.label: Dividends, Common Stock, Stock
DividendsCommonStockStock.description: Amount of paid and unpaid common stock dividends declared with the form of settlement in stock.

DueFromAffiliates.label: Due from Affiliates
DueFromAffiliates.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amount of receivables due from an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Compensation Expense
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPCompensati.description: The amount of plan compensation cost recognized during the period.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStruct.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Debt Structure, Direct Loan, Employer Cash Payments Used for Debt Service
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPDebtStruct.description: The amount of cash provided by the employer through contributions or dividends that the ESOP used in the period to repay debt and interest on a third-party loan made directly to the ESOP.

EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.label: Proceeds from Equity Method Investment, Distribution
EquityMethodInvestmentDividendsOrDistrib.description: Amount of distribution received from equity method investee for return on investment, classified as operating activities. Excludes distribution for return of investment, classified as investing activities.

FairValueOfAssetsAcquired.label: Fair Value of Assets Acquired
FairValueOfAssetsAcquired.description: The fair value of assets acquired in noncash investing or financing activities.

GrandfatheredESOPExpenseRecognitionDivid.label: Grandfathered ESOP Expense Recognition, Dividends Used by ESOP for Debt Service
GrandfatheredESOPExpenseRecognitionDivid.description: For grandfathered ESOP shares acquired prior to January 1, 1993, the amount of ESOP dividends used to pay debt service by the sop.

IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAccrued.label: Income Tax Examination, Penalties Accrued
IncomeTaxExaminationPenaltiesAccrued.description: The amount of estimated penalties accrued as of the balance sheet date arising from income tax examinations.

IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.label: Increase (Decrease) in Deferred Charges
IncreaseDecreaseInDeferredCharges.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the value of expenditures made during the current reporting period for benefits that will be received over a period of years. Deferred charges differ from prepaid expenses in that they usually extend over a long period of time and may or may not be regularly recurring costs of operation.

IncreaseDecreaseInLongTermReceivablesCur.label: Increase (Decrease) in Long-term Receivables, Current
IncreaseDecreaseInLongTermReceivablesCur.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount due within one year (or one business cycle) of receivables that were originally due beyond one year (or one business cycle).

IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.label: Increase (Decrease) in Time Deposits
IncreaseDecreaseInTimeDeposits.description: Net cash inflow (outflow) of time deposits.

InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.label: Investments in Affiliates, Subsidiaries, Associates, and Joint Ventures, Fair Value Disclosure
InvestmentsInAffiliatesSubsidiariesAssoc.description: Fair value portion of investments in an entity not consolidated. Includes, but is not limited to, investments in an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership, an entity in which the reporting entity shares control of the entity with another party or group, an entity which the company has significant influence, but does not have control and subsidiaries that are not required to be consolidated and are accounted for using the equity or cost method.

InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAmou.label: Investments in and Advances to Affiliates, Amount of Equity
InvestmentsInAndAdvancesToAffiliatesAmou.description: Amount of Equity in net profit and loss for the period. Give totals for each group. If operations of any controlled companies are different in character from those of the company, group such affiliates (1) within divisions and (2) by type of activities.

MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossOfConsoli.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Net Income (Loss) of Consolidated Entities (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
MinorityInterestInNetIncomeLossOfConsoli.description: Amount of net Income or Loss for the period allocated to noncontrolling shareholders, partners, or other equity holders in one or more of the entities included in the reporting entity's consolidated financial statements.

OilAndGasRevenue.label: Oil and Gas Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OilAndGasRevenue.description: Aggregate revenue during the period related to oil and gas business activities.

OperatingCostsAndExpenses.label: Operating Costs and Expenses
OperatingCostsAndExpenses.description: Generally recurring costs associated with normal operations except for the portion of these expenses which can be clearly related to production and included in cost of sales or services. Excludes Selling, General and Administrative Expense.

OperatingLeasePaymentsUse.label: Operating Lease, Payments, Use
OperatingLeasePaymentsUse.description: Amount of cash outflow from operating lease to bring another asset to condition and location necessary for its intended use.

OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRental.label: Operating Leases, Rent Expense, Sublease Rentals (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
OperatingLeasesRentExpenseSubleaseRental.description: The total amount of rentals incurred in the period on property subject to subleasing arrangements.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAmortizationOfDe.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Amortization, Pension and Other Postretirement Benefit Plans, Net Prior Service Cost Recognized in Net Periodic Pension Cost, Net of Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAmortizationOfDe.description: The adjustment out of other comprehensive income for prior service costs recognized as a component of net period benefit cost during the period, after tax.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, before Tax, Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, before tax and after reclassification, of gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Cash Flow Hedge, Gain (Loss), after Reclassification, Tax, Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossCashFlowHedg.description: Amount, after reclassification, of tax expense (benefit) for gain (loss) from derivative instrument designated and qualifying as cash flow hedge included in assessment of hedge effectiveness, attributable to parent.

OtherInventorySupplies.label: Other Inventory, Supplies, Gross
OtherInventorySupplies.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other supplies used within the manufacturing or production process expected to be consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

OtherNoncashExpense.label: Other Noncash Expense
OtherNoncashExpense.description: Amount of expense or loss included in net income that result in no cash flow, classified as other.

OtherNonoperatingIncome.label: Other Nonoperating Income
OtherNonoperatingIncome.description: Amount of income related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayments.label: Payment for Other Postretirement Benefits
OtherPostretirementBenefitsPayments.description: Amount of cash outflow for other postretirement benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes pension benefit.

PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Investments
PaymentsForProceedsFromInvestments.description: The net cash paid (received) associated with the acquisition or disposal of all investments, including securities and other assets.

PaymentsForTimeDeposits.label: Payments for Time Deposits
PaymentsForTimeDeposits.description: Cash paid to customers who withdraw money in checking and similar accounts at a financial institution.

PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.label: Payments of Distributions to Affiliates
PaymentsOfDistributionsToAffiliates.description: The distributions of earnings to an entity that is affiliated with the reporting entity by means of direct or indirect ownership.

PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.label: Payments to Acquire Equipment on Lease
PaymentsToAcquireEquipmentOnLease.description: The cash outflow for payments to acquire rented equipment which is recorded as an asset.

PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.label: Payments to Acquire Oil and Gas Property and Equipment
PaymentsToAcquireOilAndGasPropertyAndEqu.description: The cash outflow to purchase long lived physical asset for use in the normal oil and gas operations and to purchase mineral interests in oil and gas properties not intended for resale.

PaymentsToAcquireProjects.label: Payments to Acquire Projects
PaymentsToAcquireProjects.description: The cash outflow from the amount invested for projects in hopes of getting a future return or interest from it.

PaymentsToExploreAndDevelopOilAndGasProp.label: Payments to Explore and Develop Oil and Gas Properties
PaymentsToExploreAndDevelopOilAndGasProp.description: The cash outflow for exploration and development of oil and gas properties. It includes cash payments related to development of oil and gas wells drilled at previously untested geologic structures (to determine the presence of oil or gas) and wells drilled at sites where the presence of oil or gas has already been established (to extract the oil or gas).

PensionContributions.label: Payment for Pension Benefits
PensionContributions.description: Amount of cash outflow for pension benefit. Includes, but is not limited to, employer contribution to fund plan asset and payment to retiree. Excludes other postretirement benefit.

ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.label: Proceeds from Collection of Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromCollectionOfLongtermLoansToR.description: The cash inflow associated with collection, whether partial or full, of long-term loans to a related party. Alternate caption: Proceeds from Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.label: Proceeds, Issuance of Shares, Share-based Payment Arrangement, Including Option Exercised
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSharesUnderIncenti.description: Amount of cash inflow from issuance of shares under share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, option exercised.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredTaxExempt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Unsecured Tax Exempt Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfUnsecuredTaxExempt.description: The cash inflow from the issuance of long-term tax exempt debt that is not secured by collateral.

ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.label: Proceeds from Noncontrolling Interests
ProceedsFromMinorityShareholders.description: Amount of cash inflow from a noncontrolling interest. Includes, but is not limited to, purchase of additional shares or other increase in noncontrolling interest ownership.

ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForR.label: Proceeds from Collection of (Payments to Fund) Long-term Loans to Related Parties
ProceedsFromPaymentsForLongTermLoansForR.description: The cash inflow or outflow associated with long-term loans for related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party, including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth. Alternate caption: Proceeds from (Payments for) Advances to Affiliates.

ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Proceeds from (Repurchase of) Equity
ProceedsFromRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The net cash inflow or outflow resulting from the entity's share transaction.

ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.label: Proceeds from Sales of Assets, Investing Activities
ProceedsFromSalesOfAssetsInvestingActivi.description: Aggregate cash proceeds received from a combination of transactions that are classified as investing activities in which assets, which may include one or more investments, are sold to third-party buyers. This element can be used by entities to aggregate proceeds from all asset sales that are classified as investing activities.

ProceedsFromShortTermCapitalLeaseObligat.label: Proceeds from Short-term Capital Lease Obligations
ProceedsFromShortTermCapitalLeaseObligat.description: The cash inflow from proceeds received from lessor related to capital lease obligation.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.label: Property, Plant, and Equipment, Fair Value Disclosure
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentFairValueDisclo.description: Fair value portion of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransfersAndCha.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Transfers and Changes
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentTransfersAndCha.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale, from reclassification, impairment, donation, or changes classified as other. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, after Year Five
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation maturing after fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Five
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fifth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Four
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in fourth fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Two
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in second fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year Three
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in third fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, to be Paid, Year One
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligationD.description: Amount of recorded unconditional purchase obligation to be paid in next fiscal year following current fiscal year. Excludes interim and annual periods when interim periods are reported from current statement of financial position date (rolling approach).

RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.label: Related Party Transaction, Other Revenues from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionOtherRevenuesFrom.description: Reflects the sum of all other revenue and income realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

ResultsOfOperationsDryHoleCosts.label: Results of Operations, Dry Hole Costs
ResultsOfOperationsDryHoleCosts.description: Dry hole costs from oil and gas producing activities.

RetainedEarningsUndistributedEarningsFro.label: Retained Earnings, Undistributed Earnings from Equity Method Investees
RetainedEarningsUndistributedEarningsFro.description: Amount of consolidated retained earnings that represent undistributed (not yet received) earnings from 50% or less owned persons accounted for by the equity method (equity method investees).

RevenueFromRelatedParties.label: Revenue from Related Parties
RevenueFromRelatedParties.description: Amount of revenue, fees and commissions earned from transactions between (a) a parent company and its subsidiaries; (b) subsidiaries of a common parent; (c) an entity and trusts for the benefit of employees, for example, but not limited to, pension and profit-sharing trusts that are managed by or under the trusteeship of the entity's management; (d) an entity and its principal, owners, management, or members of their immediate families; and (e) affiliates.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Options, Other Share Increase (Decrease) in Period, Weighted Average Exercise Price (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The weighted average price at which grantees could acquire or could have acquired the underlying shares with respect to any other type of change in shares reserved for issuance under the stock option plan during the reporting period.

SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanCommi.label: Shares Held in Employee Stock Option Plan, Committed-to-be-Released
SharesHeldInEmployeeStockOptionPlanCommi.description: Number of committed-to-be-released shares held by the Employee Stock Option Plan at balance sheet date. Committed-to-be-released shares are shares that will be released in the future and will be allocated to employees for services rendered in an accounting period. These shares are legally released from suspense and from serving as collateral for ESOP debt as a result of payment of debt service.

ShortTermDebtRefinancedAmount.label: Short-term Debt, Refinanced, Amount
ShortTermDebtRefinancedAmount.description: Amount of a short-term obligation that has been excluded from current liabilities in the balance sheet because of a refinancing of the obligation.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Restricted Stock Award, Gross
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesRestrictedS.description: Total number of shares issued during the period, including shares forfeited, as a result of Restricted Stock Awards.

TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.label: Tax Cuts and Jobs Act, Incomplete Accounting, Existing Undistributed Accumulated Earnings of Foreign Subsidiary (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
TaxCutsAndJobsActOf2017IncompleteAccount.description: Amount of undistributed accumulated earnings of foreign subsidiary intended to be permanently reinvested outside country of domicile for which accounting for tax effect is incomplete pursuant to Tax Cuts and Jobs Act and no reasonable estimate is determined.

TaxesOtherThanIncomeExciseProductionAndP.label: Taxes Other than Income, Excise, Production and Property Taxes (Deprecated 2009-01-31)
TaxesOtherThanIncomeExciseProductionAndP.description: Taxes other than income taxes, if not included elsewhere, that could include, property tax or other selling and distribution-related taxes.

TreasuryStockDeferredEmployeeStockOwners.label: Deferred Employee Stock Ownership Plan, Issuance of Shares or Sale of Treasury Shares
TreasuryStockDeferredEmployeeStockOwners.description: The issuance of shares or sale of treasury shares to an Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP).

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Decrease Resulting from Foreign Currency Translation
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsDecreasesResultin.description: Amount of decrease in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.label: Unrecognized Tax Benefits, Increase Resulting from Foreign Currency Translation
UnrecognizedTaxBenefitsIncreasesResultin.description: Amount of increase in unrecognized tax benefits resulting from foreign currency translation.

CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.label: Common Stock, Shares Held in Employee Trust, Shares
CommonStockSharesHeldInEmployeeTrustShar.description: Number of common stock held in a trust that has been set up specifically to accumulate stock for the sole purpose of distribution to participating employees but not yet earned.

IncomeTaxReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable
IncomeTaxReceivable.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of income taxes previously overpaid to tax authorities (such as U.S. Federal, state and local tax authorities) representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes. Also called income tax refund receivable.

PensionExpense.label: Pension Cost (Reversal of Cost)
PensionExpense.description: Amount of cost (reversal of cost) for pension benefits. Excludes other postretirement benefits.

AssetRetirementObligationCashPaidToSettl.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Cash Paid to Settle
AssetRetirementObligationCashPaidToSettl.description: Amount of cash paid during the period to settle an asset retirement obligation. Amounts paid to settle an asset retirement obligation are generally included in the operating section of the Statement of Cash Flows.

DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Net Periodic Benefit Cost (Credit), Gain (Loss) Due to Settlement and Curtailment
DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.description: Amount of gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit (cost) credit from settlement and curtailment.

UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.label: Unrecorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation, Purchases
UnrecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligatio.description: The amount purchased during the period under an unrecorded unconditional purchase obligation (for example, under the take-or-pay or throughput contract).

AmortizationOfDeferredHedgeGains.label: Amortization of Deferred Hedge Gains
AmortizationOfDeferredHedgeGains.description: The amount of expense charged against earnings by an Entity to record deferred gains and losses on hedge instruments. Examples include gain on economic hedges, amortization of gain on designated fair value hedge and so forth.

AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.label: Asset Retirement Obligation, Current
AssetRetirementObligationCurrent.description: Current portion of the carrying amount of a liability for an asset retirement obligation. An asset retirement obligation is a legal obligation associated with the disposal or retirement of a tangible long-lived asset that results from the acquisition, construction or development, or the normal operations of a long-lived asset, except for certain obligations of lessees.

AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.label: Assets of Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Noncurrent (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
AssetsOfDisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinu.description: The aggregate value (measured at the lower of net carrying value or fair value less cost of disposal) for noncurrent assets (assets with expected useful life longer than one year or one operating cycle, whichever is longer) of a disposal group, including a component of the entity (discontinued operation), to be sold or that has subsequently been disposed of through sale, as of the financial statement date.

CustomerDepositsNoncurrent.label: Customer Deposits, Noncurrent
CustomerDepositsNoncurrent.description: The noncurrent portion of money or property received from customers that is to be returned upon satisfactory contract completion or as partial prepayment for goods or services to be provided in the future.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Credit Carryforwards, Alternative Minimum Tax
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxCreditCarryforwardsA.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible alternative minimum tax credit carryforwards.

DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Tax Deferred Expense, Compensation and Benefits, Postretirement Benefits
DeferredTaxAssetsTaxDeferredExpenseCompe.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from postretirement benefits.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Derivatives
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesDerivatives.description: Amount of deferred tax liability attributable to taxable temporary differences from derivatives.

DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.label: Derivative Assets (Liabilities), at Fair Value, Net
DerivativeAssetsLiabilitiesAtFairValueNe.description: Fair values as of the balance sheet date of the net amount of all assets and liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments.

DirectTaxesAndLicensesCosts.label: Cost, Direct Tax and License
DirectTaxesAndLicensesCosts.description: Amount of tax incurred and cost of license directly related to good produced or service rendered.

GainOnPurchaseOfBusiness.label: Gain on Purchase of Business (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
GainOnPurchaseOfBusiness.description: Amount of the excess of the fair value of acquired net assets over the cost of an acquired business after pro rata reduction of the amounts that otherwise would have been assigned to acquired assets except financial assets other than investments accounted for by the equity method, assets to be disposed of by sale, deferred tax assets, prepaid assets relating to pension and postretirement benefit plans, and other current assets. This amount is considered an extraordinary item and often referred to as negative goodwill. This element is gross of the related tax effect.

IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.label: Increase (Decrease) in Fair Value of Derivative Instruments, Not Designated as Hedging Instruments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
IncreaseDecreaseInFairValueOfUnhedgedDer.description: The increase (decrease) during the period, which was recognized in earnings, in the unrealized gains or losses on derivative instruments that are not or are no longer designated as hedging instruments.

InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclass.label: Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Gain (Loss) Reclassified to Earnings, Net
InterestRateCashFlowHedgeGainLossReclass.description: The amount of net gains or losses on interest rate cash flow hedges reclassified during the period to earnings from accumulated other comprehensive income upon the hedged transaction affecting earnings.

InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfPremium.label: Investment Income, Amortization of Premium
InvestmentIncomeAmortizationOfPremium.description: Amount of amortization of purchase premium on nonoperating securities.

MaximumPotentialFutureExposureOnCreditRi.label: Maximum Potential Future Exposure on Credit Risk Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
MaximumPotentialFutureExposureOnCreditRi.description: Maximum amount the entity would be obligated to pay on the credit risk derivatives upon occurrence of a credit event.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Reclassification Adjustment for Write-down of Securities Included in Net Income, before Tax (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
OtherComprehensiveIncomeReclassification.description: Pre tax reclassification adjustment for losses realized upon the write-down of securities.

OtherInventoryNoncurrent.label: Other Inventory, Noncurrent
OtherInventoryNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of inventories not expected to be converted to cash, sold or exchanged within the normal operating cycle (such as inventory related to long-term contracts or program rights).

OtherInvestments.label: Other Investments
OtherInvestments.description: Amount of investments classified as other.

OtherSundryLiabilitiesCurrent.label: Other Sundry Liabilities, Current
OtherSundryLiabilitiesCurrent.description: Obligations not otherwise itemized or categorized in the footnotes to the financial statements that are due within one year or operating cycle, if longer, from the balance sheet date.

PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.label: Payments for Advance to Affiliate
PaymentsForAdvanceToAffiliate.description: The cash outflow from advancing money to an affiliate (an entity that is related but not strictly controlled by the entity).

PaymentsForRoyalties.label: Payments for Royalties
PaymentsForRoyalties.description: The amount of cash paid for royalties during the current period.

PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.label: Payments of Financing Costs
PaymentsOfFinancingCosts.description: The cash outflow for loan and debt issuance costs.

PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrent.label: Postemployment Benefits Liability, Current
PostemploymentBenefitsLiabilityCurrent.description: For a classified balance sheet, the carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the portion of the obligations recognized for the various benefits provided to former or inactive employees, their beneficiaries, and covered dependents after employment but before retirement that is payable within one year of the balance sheet date.

ProceedsFromDepositsFromCustomers.label: Proceeds from Deposits from Customers
ProceedsFromDepositsFromCustomers.description: Cash received from customers for deposits on goods or services during the period; excludes deposits with other institutions and time deposits, which pertain to financial services entities.

UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.label: Unamortized Debt Issuance Expense
UnamortizedDebtIssuanceExpense.description: The remaining balance of debt issuance expenses that were capitalized and are being amortized against income over the lives of the respective bond issues. This does not include the amounts capitalized as part of the cost of the utility plant or asset.

UnrealizedGainLossOnPriceRiskFairValueHe.label: Unrealized Gain (Loss) on Price Risk Fair Value Hedging Instruments
UnrealizedGainLossOnPriceRiskFairValueHe.description: Amount of unrealized gain (loss) recognized in earnings in the period from the increase (decrease) in fair value of price risk derivatives instruments designated as fair value hedging instruments, as offset by the gain (loss) on the hedged item to the extent that the fair value hedge is determined to be effective.

AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Accounts Payable, Related Parties, Current
AccountsPayableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount for accounts payable to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
AccountsReceivableGrossCurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as current.

AccountsReceivableGrossNoncurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, before Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
AccountsReceivableGrossNoncurrent.description: Amount, before allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration from customer for product sold and service rendered in normal course of business, classified as noncurrent.

AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Accounts Receivable, Related Parties, Current
AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Amount of receivables arising from transactions with related parties due within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

AccruedEmployeeBenefitsCurrentAndNoncurr.label: Accrued Employee Benefits
AccruedEmployeeBenefitsCurrentAndNoncurr.description: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations, excluding pension and other postretirement benefits, incurred through that date and payable for perquisites provided to employees pertaining to services received from them.

AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.label: Adjustments to Additional Paid in Capital, Equity Component of Convertible Debt
AdjustmentsToAdditionalPaidInCapitalEqui.description: Adjustment to additional paid in capital resulting from the recognition of convertible debt instruments as two separate components - a debt component and an equity component. This bifurcation may result in a basis difference associated with the liability component that represents a temporary difference for purposes of applying accounting for income taxes. The initial recognition of deferred taxes for the tax effect of that temporary difference is as an adjustment to additional paid in capital.

BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Fair Value (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.description: In a business combination achieved in stages, this element represents the acquisition-date fair value of the equity interest in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date.

BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.label: Business Combination, Step Acquisition, Equity Interest in Acquiree, Percentage
BusinessCombinationStepAcquisitionEquity.description: Percentage of equity in the acquiree held by the acquirer immediately before the acquisition date in a business combination.

CargoAndFreightRevenue.label: Cargo and Freight Revenue (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
CargoAndFreightRevenue.description: Revenue from transporting cargo and freight between locations.

DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.label: Debt Conversion, Converted Instrument, Shares Issued (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
DebtConversionConvertedInstrumentSharesI.description: The number of shares issued in exchange for the original debt being converted in a noncash (or part noncash) transaction. "Part noncash" refers to that portion of the transaction not resulting in cash receipts or cash payments in the period.

DebtInstrumentIncreaseAdditionalBorrowin.label: Debt Instrument, Increase, Additional Borrowings (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DebtInstrumentIncreaseAdditionalBorrowin.description: Increase of additional borrowings on existing and new debt instruments.

DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Derivative Instruments
DeferredTaxAssetsDerivativeInstruments.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible temporary differences from derivative instruments.

DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPrepaidPensionCost.label: Deferred Tax Liabilities, Prepaid Pension Costs (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DeferredTaxLiabilitiesPrepaidPensionCost.description: The amount as of the balance sheet date of the estimated future tax effects attributable to the difference between the tax basis of pension liabilities funded in advance and the basis of a prepaid pension asset determined in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. The difference in basis of such costs will increase future taxable income when such basis difference reverses. Prepaid pension costs represented the cumulative employer's contributions in excess of net pension cost recognized, before the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158. Under FAS 158, prepaid pension costs are no longer recognized in the statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Five (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 5.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Four (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 4.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year One (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 1.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Three (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 3.

DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Expected Future Benefit Payments in Year Two (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanExpectedFutureBenefitP.description: The amount of the benefits expected to be paid in Year 2.

DerivativeAmountOfHedgedItem.label: Derivative, Amount of Hedged Item
DerivativeAmountOfHedgedItem.description: Amount of hedged item in hedging relationship. Excludes hedged asset or liability.

DerivativeAverageFixedInterestRate.label: Derivative, Average Fixed Interest Rate
DerivativeAverageFixedInterestRate.description: Average fixed interest rate related to the group of interest rate derivatives.

DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Assets
DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedges.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the asset arising from derivative instruments and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesLiabilitie.label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Liabilities
DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesLiabilitie.description: Sum as of the balance sheet date of the (a) fair values of all liabilities resulting from contracts that meet the criteria of being accounted for as derivative instruments, and (b) the carrying amounts of the liabilities arising from financial instruments or contracts used to mitigate a specified risk (hedge), and which are expected to be extinguished or otherwise disposed of within a year or the normal operating cycle, if longer, net of the effects of master netting arrangements.

DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesNoncurrent.label: Derivative Instruments and Hedges, Noncurrent
DerivativeInstrumentsAndHedgesNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of the assets arising from derivative contracts and hedging activities, which are expected to be converted into cash or otherwise disposed of after a year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DerivativeVariableInterestRate.label: Derivative, Variable Interest Rate
DerivativeVariableInterestRate.description: Variable interest rate in effect as of the balance sheet date related to the interest rate derivative.

DirectOperatingCosts.label: Direct Operating Costs
DirectOperatingCosts.description: The aggregate direct operating costs incurred during the reporting period.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts Payable
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as accounts payable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Liabilities
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as other liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

DueFromRelatedParties.label: Due from Related Parties
DueFromRelatedParties.description: For an unclassified balance sheet, amounts due from related parties including affiliates, employees, joint ventures, officers and stockholders, immediate families thereof, and pension funds.

DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Current
DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: The aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due within one year (or one business cycle).

DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.label: Due from Related Parties, Noncurrent
DueFromRelatedPartiesNoncurrent.description: Aggregate amount of receivables to be collected from related parties where one party can exercise control or significant influence over another party; including affiliates, owners or officers and their immediate families, pension trusts, and so forth, at the financial statement date. which are usually due after one year (or one business cycle).

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.label: Due to Related Parties, Current
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties. For classified balance sheets, represents the current portion of such liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Due to Related Parties
DueToRelatedPartiesCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of obligations due all related parties.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxH.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Holiday, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationTaxH.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to income exempt from income tax because of a tax holiday.

EnergyRelatedInventoryCoal.label: Energy Related Inventory, Coal
EnergyRelatedInventoryCoal.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of coal, which is a combustible rock or minerals which are extracted from the ground and used as fuel.

ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation.label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation.description: The foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in the functional currency to the reporting currency.

ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation1.label: Foreign Currency Exchange Rate, Translation
ForeignCurrencyExchangeRateTranslation1.description: Foreign exchange rate used to translate amounts denominated in functional currency to reporting currency.

GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Other Assets
GainLossOnSaleOfOtherAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of other assets.

GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Stock in Subsidiary or Equity Method Investee
GainLossOnSaleOfStockInSubsidiaryOrEquit.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of equity in securities of subsidiaries or equity method investee.

IncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Income Taxes Receivable, Current
IncomeTaxesReceivable.description: Carrying amount due within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from tax authorities as of the balance sheet date representing refunds of overpayments or recoveries based on agreed-upon resolutions of disputes.

IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Charitable Contributions, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationNondeductibleExpe.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to nondeductible charitable contributions expense.

IncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeRelatedLiabili.label: Increase (Decrease) in Employee Related Liabilities
IncreaseDecreaseInEmployeeRelatedLiabili.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate amount of obligations related to services received from employees, such as accrued salaries and bonuses, payroll taxes and fringe benefits.

IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.label: Increase (Decrease) in Income Taxes Receivable
IncreaseDecreaseInIncomeTaxesReceivable.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid.

IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.label: Interest Expense, Subordinated Notes and Debentures
InterestExpenseSubordinatedNotesAndDeben.description: Interest expense incurred during the reporting period on subordinated notes and debentures. Includes amortization of expenses incurred in the issuance of subordinated notes and debentures.

InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.label: Interest Payable
InterestPayableCurrentAndNoncurrent.description: Amount of interest payable on debt, including, but not limited to, trade payables.

LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueNoncu.label: Loss Contingency, Accrual, Noncurrent
LossContingencyAccrualCarryingValueNoncu.description: Amount of loss contingency liability expected to be resolved after one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

MineralExtractionProcessingAndMarketingC.label: Mineral Extraction Processing and Marketing Costs (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
MineralExtractionProcessingAndMarketingC.description: Costs incurred related to mineral extraction, processing and marketing.

NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Continuing Operations
NetCashProvidedByUsedInContinuingOperati.description: The increase (decrease) in cash associated with the entity's continuing operating, investing, and financing activities. While for technical reasons this element has no balance attribute, the default assumption is a debit balance consistent with its label.

NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.label: Notes Payable, Related Parties, Current
NotesPayableRelatedPartiesClassifiedCurr.description: The amount for notes payable (written promise to pay), due to related parties. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

OtherAssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.label: Other Assets Held-for-sale, Current (Deprecated 2014-01-31)
OtherAssetsHeldForSaleCurrent.description: The lower of the carrying value or fair value less cost to sell of current assets held for sale that are not elsewhere specified in the taxonomy. The carrying value of major classes of assets and liabilities of the disposal group are separately disclosed in the balance sheet in the specific concepts provided.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-sale Securities Adjustment, before Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
OtherComprehensiveIncomeAvailableforsale.description: Amount before tax, after reclassification adjustments, of appreciation (loss) in value of unsold available-for-sale securities, attributable to parent entity. Excludes amounts related to other than temporary impairment (OTTI) loss.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.label: Other Comprehensive (Income) Loss, Defined Benefit Plan, after Reclassification Adjustment, Tax, Attributable to Noncontrolling Interest
OtherComprehensiveIncomeDefinedBenefitPl.description: Amount, after reclassification adjustment, of tax (expense) benefit for (increase) decrease in accumulated other comprehensive income for defined benefit plan, attributable to noncontrolling interest.

OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.label: Other Cost of Operating Revenue
OtherCostOfOperatingRevenue.description: Other costs incurred during the reporting period related to other revenue generating activities.

OtherInventoriesSpareParts.label: Other Inventories, Spare Parts, Gross
OtherInventoriesSpareParts.description: Gross amount of components of assembled products that can be sold directly or indirectly through sales of assembled products.

OtherInventory.label: Other Inventory, Gross
OtherInventory.description: Amount before valuation and LIFO reserves of other inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

OtherSalesRevenueNet.label: Other Revenue, Net (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
OtherSalesRevenueNet.description: Amount, after sales adjustments, returns, allowances, and discounts, of revenue classified as other.

PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.label: Payments for Repurchase of Equity
PaymentsForRepurchaseOfEquity.description: The cash outflow to reacquire common and preferred stock.

PaymentsToAcquireOtherReceivables.label: Payments to Acquire Other Receivables
PaymentsToAcquireOtherReceivables.description: Amount of cash outflow from the purchase of receivables classified as other.

PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.label: Prepaid Expense, Noncurrent
PrepaidExpenseNoncurrent.description: Sum of the carrying amounts as of the balance sheet date of amounts paid in advance for expenses which will be charged against earnings in periods after one year or beyond the operating cycle, if longer.

PrepaidPensionCosts.label: Prepaid Pension Costs (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
PrepaidPensionCosts.description: Cumulative employer's contributions in excess of net pension cost recognized, before the adoption of the recognition provisions of FAS 158. Under FAS 158, prepaid pension costs are no longer recognized in the statement of financial position. Note that there is a separate concept for noncurrent assets relating to defined benefit pension and other defined benefit postretirement plans for use under the recognition provisions of FAS 158.

RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligation.label: Recorded Unconditional Purchase Obligation
RecordedUnconditionalPurchaseObligation.description: Amount of the recorded obligation to transfer funds in the future for fixed or minimum amounts or quantities of goods or services at fixed or minimum prices (for example, as in take-or-pay contracts or throughput contracts).

RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Expenses from Transactions with Related Party
RelatedPartyTransactionExpensesFromTrans.description: Expenses recognized resulting from transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party.

RelatedPartyTransactionRevenuesFromTrans.label: Related Party Transaction, Revenues from Transactions with Related Party (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
RelatedPartyTransactionRevenuesFromTrans.description: Revenues, net of returns and allowances, realized from sales and other transactions (excluding transactions that are eliminated in consolidated or combined financial statements) with related party during the period.

RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.label: Repayments of Other Long-term Debt
RepaymentsOfOtherLongTermDebt.description: Amount of cash outflow for the payment of debt classified as other, maturing after one year or the operating cycle, if longer.

RetainedEarningsAppropriated.label: Retained Earnings, Appropriated
