AllowanceForDoubtfulAccountsPremiumsAndO.description: The valuation allowance as of the balance sheet date to reduce the gross amount of receivables to estimated net realizable value, which would be presented in parentheses on the face of the balance sheet.

AssetsThatContinueToBeRecognizedSecuriti.label: Assets that Continue to be Recognized, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Net Credit Losses During Period
AssetsThatContinueToBeRecognizedSecuriti.description: Amount of net credit losses charged off.

BridgeLoan.label: Bridge Loan
BridgeLoan.description: Short-Term financing which is expected to be paid back relatively quickly, such as by a subsequent longer-term loan. Also called swing loan or bridge financing.

BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.label: Business Acquisition, Purchase Price Allocation, Current Liabilities, Long-term Debt (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
BusinessAcquisitionPurchasePriceAllocati.description: The amount of acquisition cost of a business combination allocated to the current portion of long-term debt of the acquired entity.

CapitalizedContractCostAmortization.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Amortization
CapitalizedContractCostAmortization.description: Amount of amortization expense for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostImpairmentLoss.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Impairment Loss
CapitalizedContractCostImpairmentLoss.description: Amount of impairment loss for asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostNet.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net
CapitalizedContractCostNet.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer.

CapitalizedContractCostNetCurrent.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Current
CapitalizedContractCostNetCurrent.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as current.

CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvest.label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases, Current
CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvest.description: The net amount due within one year of the balance sheet date or the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvest.label: Capital Leases, Lessor Balance Sheet, Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases, Noncurrent
CapitalLeasesLessorBalanceSheetNetInvest.description: The net amount due after one year of the balance sheet date or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer, consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

CommonStockDividendsShares.label: Common Stock Dividends, Shares
CommonStockDividendsShares.description: Number of shares of common stock issued as dividends during the period. Excludes stock splits.

ConcentrationRiskPercentage.label: Concentration Risk, Percentage (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ConcentrationRiskPercentage.description: For an entity that discloses a concentration risk in relation to quantitative amount, which serves as the "benchmark" (or denominator) in the equation, this concept represents the concentration percentage derived from the division.

ContractWithCustomerAssetCreditLossExpen.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Credit Loss Expense (Reversal)
ContractWithCustomerAssetCreditLossExpen.description: Amount of expense (reversal of expense) for expected credit loss on right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time.

ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, Reclassified to Receivable
ContractWithCustomerAssetReclassifiedToR.description: Amount of decrease in right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time from transfer to receivable due to right to consideration becoming unconditional.

DebtInstrumentIncreaseDecreaseOtherNet.label: Debt Instrument, Increase (Decrease), Other, Net
DebtInstrumentIncreaseDecreaseOtherNet.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in debt instruments, classified as other.

DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuance.label: Debt Related Commitment Fees and Debt Issuance Costs
DebtRelatedCommitmentFeesAndDebtIssuance.description: Represents the charge against earnings during the period for commitment fees and debt issuance expenses.

DeferredCompensationEquity.label: Deferred Compensation Equity
DeferredCompensationEquity.description: Value of stock issued under share-based plans to employees or officers which is the unearned portion, accounted for under the fair value method.

DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.label: Deferred Tax Assets, Operating Loss Carryforwards, Subject to Expiration
DeferredTaxAssetsOperatingLossCarryforwa.description: Amount before allocation of valuation allowances of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible operating loss carryforwards that are subject to expiration dates.

DefinedBenefitPlanAmountOfEmployerAndRel.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Plan Assets, Employer, Related Party, Amount
DefinedBenefitPlanAmountOfEmployerAndRel.description: Amount of employer security in which defined benefit plan asset is invested. Includes, but is not limited to, security issued or managed by related party of employer.

DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Assumptions Used Calculating Benefit Obligation, Rate of Compensation Increase
DefinedBenefitPlanAssumptionsUsedCalcula.description: Weighted average rate increase of compensation, used to determine benefit obligation of defined benefit plan. Plan includes, but is not limited to, pay-related defined benefit plan.

DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProject.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Projected Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Plan Assets
DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProject.description: Amount of plan asset for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProject.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Pension Plan with Projected Benefit Obligation in Excess of Plan Assets, Projected Benefit Obligation
DefinedBenefitPlanPensionPlanWithProject.description: Amount of projected benefit obligation for defined benefit pension plan with projected benefit obligation in excess of plan assets.

DefinedBenefitPlanPrescriptionDrugBenefi.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Prescription Drug Benefit, Accumulated Postretirement Benefit Obligation, Decrease for Subsidy
DefinedBenefitPlanPrescriptionDrugBenefi.description: Amount of decrease in accumulated postretirement benefit obligation for government subsidy related to prescription drug benefits attributed to past service.

DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Recognized Net (Gain) Loss Due to Settlements (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanRecognizedNetGainLossD.description: The amount of net gain (loss) recognized in net periodic benefit cost as a result of an irrevocable action that relieves the employer (or the plan) of primary responsibility for a benefit obligation and eliminates significant risks related to the obligation and the assets used to effect the settlement. Examples of transactions that constitute a settlement include (a) making lump-sum cash payments to plan participants in exchange for their rights to receive specified benefits and (b) purchasing nonparticipating annuity contracts to cover vested benefits.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Other (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation percentage in other than debt securities, equity securities, and real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.label: Defined Benefit Plan, Target Allocation Percentage of Assets, Real Estate (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
DefinedBenefitPlanTargetAllocationPercen.description: Target allocation percentage of investments in real estate to total plan assets presented on a weighted-average basis as of the measurement date of the latest statement of financial position.

DerecognizedAssetsSecuritizedOrAssetback.label: Derecognized Assets, Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement Assets and any Other Financial Assets Managed Together, Net Credit Losses During Period
DerecognizedAssetsSecuritizedOrAssetback.description: Net credit losses are charge-offs and are based on total loans outstanding during the period.

DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Goodwill, Noncurrent
DisposalGroupIncludingDiscontinuedOperat.description: Amount classified as goodwill attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Declared (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.description: The equity impact of cash distributions declared to a common shareholder or unit-holder by a LLC or LP.

DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.label: Distribution Made to Member or Limited Partner, Cash Distributions Paid (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
DistributionMadeToMemberOrLimitedPartner.description: The amount of cash distributions paid to a common shareholder or unit-holder by a LLC or LP.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Deduction, Medicare Prescription Drug Benefit, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationDedu.description: Percentage of difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to deduction for Medicare prescription drug benefit subsidy.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationEqui.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Equity in Earnings (Losses) of Unconsolidated Subsidiary, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationEqui.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to equity in earnings (loss) of unconsolidated subsidiaries exempt from income taxes.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationMino.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Noncontrolling Interest Income (Loss), Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationMino.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to noncontrolling interest income (loss) exempt from income taxes.

EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Nondeductible Expense, Other, Percent
EffectiveIncomeTaxRateReconciliationNond.description: Percentage of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to other nondeductible expenses.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefits and Share-based Compensation
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of expense for employee benefit and equity-based compensation.

EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.label: Employee Benefit and Share-based Payment Arrangement, Noncash
EmployeeBenefitsAndShareBasedCompensatio.description: Amount of noncash expense (reversal of expense) for employee benefits and share-based payment arrangement. Includes, but is not limited to, pension, other postretirement, postemployment and termination benefits.

EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSu.label: Employee Stock Ownership Plan (ESOP), Number of Suspense Shares
EmployeeStockOwnershipPlanESOPNumberOfSu.description: Shares contributed to the ESOP that have not yet been released, committed to be released, or allocated to participant accounts. Suspense shares generally collateralize ESOP debt.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Extraordinary Items and Cumulative Effect of Change in Accounting Principle (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: This item represents the disclosure of summarized financial information for unconsolidated subsidiaries and 50 percent-or-less owned entities accounted for using the equity method of accounting. If investments in common stock of corporate joint ventures or other investments accounted for under the equity method are, in the aggregate, material in relation to the financial position or results of operations of an investor, it may be necessary to present summarized information as to assets of the investee, or group of investments for which combined disclosure is appropriate, either by individual financial statement caption or in groups, as appropriate. Such summarized financial information may, at a minimum, include income or loss from continuing operations before extraordinary items and cumulative effect of a change in accounting principle.

EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.label: Equity Method Investment, Summarized Financial Information, Liabilities and Equity (Deprecated 2020-01-31)
EquityMethodInvestmentSummarizedFinancia.description: The amount of liabilities and equity reported by an equity method investment of the entity.

FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.label: Fair Value, Measurement with Unobservable Inputs Reconciliation, Recurring Basis, Asset, Period Increase (Decrease)
FairValueMeasurementWithUnobservableInpu.description: Amount of increase (decrease) of financial instrument classified as an asset measured using unobservable inputs that reflect the entity's own assumption about the assumptions market participants would use in pricing.

ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeAssetAtFairV.label: Foreign Currency Cash Flow Hedge Asset at Fair Value
ForeignCurrencyCashFlowHedgeAssetAtFairV.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all foreign currency derivative assets designated as cash flow hedging instruments.

GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Intangible Assets
GainLossOnDispositionOfIntangibleAssets.description: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of intangible assets.

GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.label: Gain (Loss) on Extinguishment of Debt, before Write off of Debt Issuance Cost
GainsLossesOnExtinguishmentOfDebtBeforeW.description: Reflects the difference between the fair value of payments made to legally extinguish a debt and its carrying value at that time. This item excludes the write-off of amounts previously capitalized as debt issuance costs.

GoodwillTransfers.label: Goodwill, Transfers
GoodwillTransfers.description: Amount of transfers into (out of) an asset representing the future economic benefits arising from other assets acquired in a business combination that are not individually identified and separately recognized.

GuarantyLiabilities.label: Guaranty Liabilities
GuarantyLiabilities.description: This item represents a non-contingent liability for the fair value of an obligation to stand ready to perform over the term of a guaranty issued in the event that specified triggering events or conditions occur.

IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestm.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Tax Credit, Investment, Amount
IncomeTaxReconciliationTaxCreditsInvestm.description: Amount of the difference between reported income tax expense (benefit) and expected income tax expense (benefit) computed by applying the domestic federal statutory income tax rates to pretax income (loss) from continuing operations attributable to investment tax credit.

IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableFrom.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Receivable from Securitization
IncreaseDecreaseInAccountsReceivableFrom.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amount owed to the reporting entity by counterparties in securitized loan transactions.

IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.label: Increase (Decrease) in Notes Receivables
IncreaseDecreaseInNotesReceivables.description: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period of the amounts due from borrowers for outstanding secured or unsecured loans evidenced by a note.

IndefiniteLivedLicenseAgreements.label: Indefinite-Lived License Agreements
IndefiniteLivedLicenseAgreements.description: Carrying amount (original costs adjusted for previously recognized amortization and impairment) as of the balance sheet date for the capitalized costs to acquire rights under a license arrangement (for example, to sell specified products in a specified territory) having an indefinite period of benefit.

InterestRateFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFai.label: Interest Rate Fair Value Hedge Liability at Fair Value
InterestRateFairValueHedgeLiabilityAtFai.description: Fair value as of the balance sheet date of all derivative liabilities designated as interest rate fair value hedging instruments.

LeveragedLeaseInvestment.label: Leveraged Lease Investment
LeveragedLeaseInvestment.description: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of leveraged lease investments which represent the aggregate amount of the estimated residual value of the lease assets and lease payments receivables, net of unearned and deferred income to be allocated over the lease term and non-recourse debt.

LeveragedLeasesBalanceSheetDeferredTaxes.label: Leveraged Leases, Balance Sheet, Deferred Taxes Arising from Leveraged Leases
LeveragedLeasesBalanceSheetDeferredTaxes.description: The liability for taxes payable in the future as a result of temporary differences in treatment of certain items in the current year arising from the net investment in arrangements meeting the criteria for classification as a leveraged lease.

LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureRecurring.label: Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure, Recurring (Deprecated 2018-01-31)
LiabilitiesFairValueDisclosureRecurring.description: Aggregation of the liabilities reported on the balance sheet measured at fair value on a recurring basis by the entity.

LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseRepayments.label: Line of Credit Facility, Decrease, Repayments (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
LineOfCreditFacilityDecreaseRepayments.description: Decrease for amounts repaid on the credit facility for the period.

MinorityInterestInOperatingPartnerships.label: Noncontrolling Interest in Operating Partnerships
MinorityInterestInOperatingPartnerships.description: Carrying amount of the equity interests owned by noncontrolling partners in an operating partnership included in the entity's consolidated financial statements.

NetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTy.label: Net Investment in Direct Financing and Sales Type Leases
NetInvestmentInDirectFinancingAndSalesTy.description: The net amount due as of the balance sheet date consisting of: (a) minimum lease payments due on direct financing and sales-type leases, (b) unguaranteed residual value, and (c) any unamortized initial direct costs on direct financing leases; less: (i) executory costs, (ii) unearned income, and (iii) the accumulated allowance for uncollectible minimum lease payments.

NotesPayable.label: Notes Payable
NotesPayable.description: Including the current and noncurrent portions, aggregate carrying amount of all types of notes payable, as of the balance sheet date, with initial maturities beyond one year or beyond the normal operating cycle, if longer.

NotesPayableCurrent.label: Notes Payable, Current
NotesPayableCurrent.description: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of long-term notes payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

NotionalAmountOfInterestRateCashFlowHedg.label: Notional Amount of Interest Rate Cash Flow Hedge Derivatives (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
NotionalAmountOfInterestRateCashFlowHedg.description: Aggregate notional amount of all interest rate derivatives designated as hedging instruments in cash flow hedges. Notional amount refers to the monetary amount specified in the interest rate derivative contract.

OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.label: OCI, before Reclassifications, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
OciBeforeReclassificationsNetOfTaxAttrib.description: Amount after tax, before reclassification adjustments, of other comprehensive income (loss), attributable to parent.

OtherInvestmentNotReadilyMarketableFairV.label: Other Investment Not Readily Marketable, Fair Value
OtherInvestmentNotReadilyMarketableFairV.description: Value of the other investment not readily marketable determined by management based upon fair value methods, including pricing of similar securities and valuation techniques, that was used to record the investment for financial reporting purposes.

OtherNonoperatingExpense.label: Other Nonoperating Expense
OtherNonoperatingExpense.description: Amount of expense related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

PaymentsForMergerRelatedCosts.label: Payments for Merger Related Costs
PaymentsForMergerRelatedCosts.description: The amount of cash paid during the reporting period for charges associated with the mergers.

PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits.label: Payments for Postemployment Benefits
PaymentsForPostemploymentBenefits.description: Cash outflows for payments of postemployment benefits (such as severance pay and health insurance benefits) recognized during the period. Postemployment benefits are benefits paid to employees after employment but before retirement.

PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedFinanc.label: Pledged Assets, Not Separately Reported, Finance Receivables
PledgedAssetsNotSeparatelyReportedFinanc.description: The carrying amount, as of the date of the latest financial statement presented, of finance receivables which are owned but transferred to serve as collateral for the payment of the related debt obligation, primarily a secured borrowing or repurchase agreement, and for which the transferee is not permitted to sell or re-pledge them to an unrelated party.

PrescriptionDrugBenefitReductionInAccumu.label: Prescription Drug Benefit, Reduction in Accumulated Postretirement Benefit Obligation for Subsidy (Deprecated 2017-01-31)
PrescriptionDrugBenefitReductionInAccumu.description: Amount of the reduction in the accumulated postretirement benefit obligation for the government subsidy related to prescription drug benefits attributed to past service. Disclosure relates to the first period in which an employer includes the effects of the subsidy in measuring the accumulated postretirement benefit obligation and net periodic postretirement benefit cost.

PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManaged.label: Principal Amount Outstanding on Loans Managed and Securitized or Asset-backed Financing Arrangement
PrincipalAmountOutstandingOnLoansManaged.description: This is the sum of principal amount outstanding for both securitized and unsecuritized loans of all types.

ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.label: Proceeds from Issuance of Secured Debt
ProceedsFromIssuanceOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash inflow from amounts received from issuance of long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes proceeds from tax exempt secured debt.

ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.label: Proceeds from Sale of Intangible Assets
ProceedsFromSaleOfIntangibleAssets.description: The cash inflow from disposal of asset without physical form usually arising from contractual or other legal rights, excluding goodwill.

PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Other, Gross
PropertyPlantAndEquipmentOther.description: Amount before accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of other physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Discount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestDiscount.description: Disclosure of the unamortized amount of the discount on the note or receivable which is deducted from the face amount of the receivable or loan. The discount or premium is the difference between the present value and the face amount.

ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.label: Receivable with Imputed Interest, Net Amount
ReceivableWithImputedInterestNetAmount.description: The receivable or note face amount less the unamortized discount or premium.

ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.label: Reclassification from AOCI, Current Period, Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
ReclassificationFromAociCurrentPeriodNet.description: Amount after tax of reclassification adjustments of other comprehensive income (loss) attributable to parent.

RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.label: Repayments of Secured Debt
RepaymentsOfSecuredDebt.description: The cash outflow to repay long-term debt that is wholly or partially secured by collateral. Excludes repayments of tax exempt secured debt.

RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.label: Revenue Not from Contract with Customer
RevenueNotFromContractWithCustomer.description: Amount of revenue that is not accounted for under Topic 606.

SegmentReportingAssetReconcilingItemAmou.label: Segment Reporting, Asset Reconciling Item, Amount (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingAssetReconcilingItemAmou.description: Amount of an item in the reconciliation of total assets from reportable segments to the entity's consolidated assets.

SegmentReportingInformationDepreciationE.label: Segment Reporting Information, Depreciation Expense (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationDepreciationE.description: Amount of depreciation expense for the reportable segment. Such disclosure is presented if the amount is: (a) included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

SegmentReportingInformationNetAssets.label: Segment Reporting Information, Net Assets (Deprecated 2013-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationNetAssets.description: Amount of net assets (total assets less total liabilities) attributed to the reportable segment.

SegmentReportingInformationPropertyPlant.label: Segment Reporting Information, Property, Plant, and Equipment, Net (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingInformationPropertyPlant.description: Tangible assets attributed to the reportable segment for use in the production or supply of goods and services, for rental to others, or for administrative purposes, net of accumulated depreciation. Examples include land, buildings, machinery, vehicles, furniture, and computer equipment.

SegmentReportingReconcilingItemsRevenue.label: Segment Reporting, Reconciling Items, Revenue (Deprecated 2011-01-31)
SegmentReportingReconcilingItemsRevenue.description: Total of reconciling items between total reportable segments' revenues and consolidated entity revenues.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term, Maximum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The maximum period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.label: Share-based Compensation Arrangement by Share-based Payment Award, Fair Value Assumptions, Expected Term, Minimum (Deprecated 2012-01-31)
ShareBasedCompensationArrangementByShare.description: The minimum period of time an equity-based award is expected to be outstanding. An equity-based award's expected term is generally determined based on, among other factors, the instrument's contractual term and the effects of employees' expected exercise and post-vesting employment termination behavior.

SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.label: Financial Instruments Subject to Mandatory Redemption, Settlement Terms, Share Value, Amount, Noncurrent
SharesSubjectToMandatoryRedemptionSettle.description: The amount that is required to be paid, determined under the conditions specified in the contract, if as of the reporting date, the holder of the share has exercised the right to or the shares are mandatorily redeemable after one year from the reporting date or operating cycle, if longer.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPeriodIncre.label: Stock Issued During Period, Shares, Period Increase (Decrease)
StockIssuedDuringPeriodSharesPeriodIncre.description: The increase (decrease) during the period in the number of shares issued.

StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.label: Stock Issued During Period, Value, Employee Stock Purchase Plan
StockIssuedDuringPeriodValueEmployeeStoc.description: Aggregate change in value for stock issued during the period as a result of employee stock purchase plan.

SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsSeveranc.label: Supplemental Unemployment Benefits, Severance Benefits
SupplementalUnemploymentBenefitsSeveranc.description: Liability for amount due employees, in addition to wages and any other money that employers owe employees, when their employment ends through a layoff or other termination. For example, a company may provide involuntarily terminated employees with a lump sum payment equal to one week's salary for every year of employment.

ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.label: SEC Schedule, 12-09, Valuation Allowances and Reserves, Period Increase (Decrease)
ValuationAllowancesAndReservesPeriodIncr.description: Amount of increase (decrease) in valuation and qualifying accounts and reserves.

CapitalizedContractCostNetNoncurrent.label: Capitalized Contract Cost, Net, Noncurrent
CapitalizedContractCostNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after accumulated amortization and accumulated impairment loss, of asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer; classified as noncurrent.

ContractWithCustomerAssetNetNoncurrent.label: Contract with Customer, Asset, after Allowance for Credit Loss, Noncurrent
ContractWithCustomerAssetNetNoncurrent.description: Amount, after allowance for credit loss, of right to consideration in exchange for good or service transferred to customer when right is conditioned on something other than passage of time, classified as noncurrent.

OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeEx.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Derivative, Excluded Component, Increase (Decrease), after Adjustments and Tax
OtherComprehensiveIncomeLossDerivativeEx.description: Amount, after tax and adjustments, of gain (loss) from increase (decrease) in value of excluded component of derivative designated and qualifying as hedge. Adjustments include, but are not limited to, reclassifications for sale and settlement, and amounts recognized under systematic and rational method.

PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Derivative Instrument, Investing Activities
PaymentsForProceedsFromDerivativeInstrum.description: The net cash outflow or inflow from derivative instruments during the period, which are classified as investing activities, excluding those designated as hedging instruments.

DerivativeGainOnDerivative.label: Derivative, Gain on Derivative
DerivativeGainOnDerivative.description: Amount of increase in the fair value of derivatives recognized in the income statement.

CommonStockValueOutstanding.label: Common Stock, Value, Outstanding
CommonStockValueOutstanding.description: Value of all classes of common stock held by shareholders. May be all or portion of the number of common shares authorized. These shares exclude common shares repurchased by the entity and held as treasury shares.

PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBene.label: Liability, Defined Benefit Plan
PensionAndOtherPostretirementDefinedBene.description: Amount of liability, recognized in statement of financial position, for defined benefit pension and other postretirement plans.
